channel.title: Bawdy Storytelling
channel.itunes:summary: Bawdy Storytelling – dubbed 'The Moth for pervs' by the LA Weekly – is the nation’s original sex and storytelling series. Founded, emcee’ed and curated by sexual folklorist Dixie De La Tour, Bawdy Storytelling features real people and rockstars sharing their bona fide sexual exploits. Bawdy Storytelling’s one-of-a-kind approach to sex-positive personal narrative has coaxed liberating tales out of everyday people, creating unforgettable experiences for performers and audiences alike. These stories aren't memorized. Storytellers aren't reading from cue cards. This is honest-to-badness story time with true sexcapades and poignant, hilarious, transformational tales at each and every show.
channel.itunes:author: Dixie De La Tour

item.title: Episode 248: ‘Off to the Chariot Races‘ (Mx Shannon Amitin)
item.itunes:title: ‘Off to the Chariot Races‘ (Mx Shannon Amitin)
item.description:
Have you ever had muscular strangers seek you out for your tiny hands? Trans activist Mx Shannon Amitin is no stranger to San Francisco’s kinky underbelly, but when an infamous trans tourist he admires wants a sexual blowout on Folsom weekend, Shannon escorts them all over his city - and ends up elbow deep in a tub of Crisco for the first time. #MakeMeAMuppet #DirtyQueer #Sling

 

 

Song: ‘I Can Change’ (Ezra Furman)

 

About the Storyteller:

• Mx. Shannon Amitin is a Trans activist, community leader, and entrepreneur. Shannon has volunteered with The Compton’s Transgender District, Castro LGBT Cultural District, served on the planning committee for Trans March SF and fundraised for numerous Bay Area non-profits. Amitin’s last project is the ground-breaking San Francisco trans youth of color-led coffee and event cooperative. Fluid is a partnership with La Cocina’s Municipal Marketplace in the Tenderloin.

Today, Amitin is looking to use their experience building community among diverse groups of LGBTQ communities to make these cities a better place for all queer folks. They have served on the boards of the Castro Merchants, the Alice B. Toklas Democratic Club, and were elected to the newly legislated Castro LGBTQ Cultural District.

At the end of the day, Amitin sees their projects as a service to the communities they call home. The mission is simple and personal as hell; fighting to keep LGBTQ communities safe, thriving and dancing.

In addition to his commercial work, Amitin is a tireless advocate and innovator, working to create safe spaces and events for the entire Queer and Trans community. Learn more about Shannon at https://www.shannonamitin.com/

 

Episode links:

 

SAN FRANCISCO: Our last live event of the Year - nay, our last live show till Bawdy’s 16 year Anniversary in Feb 2023 - will be on Friday, November 18th. Our theme? ‘Pornucopia: Stories of Abundance and Gratitude’ as I want to draw attention to all the good we have in our lives. Please join us at the Verdi Club in San Francisco, in person, if you can. Or tune in to the Livestream, wherever you are. Tickets are on sale now at https://BawdyPAGratitude.eventbrite.com

 

Dipsea is an app full of hundreds of short, sexy audio stories designed by women, for women. They bring scenarios to life with immersive soundscapes and characters, no matter who you’re into or what turns you on. New content is released every week, so in between listening to your favorite stories, again and again, you can always find something new to explore.

And for listeners of this show, Dipsea is offering an extended 30 day free trial when you go to 

DipseaStories.com/DIXIE

 

Patreon: Live shows attendance has been really hit and miss lately due to COVID fears, and as we get close to the new year, I’m having a hard time figuring out where to focus my energy. As I face this new post-Lockdown frontier, do I buy new equipment for online shows? Do I agree to the exorbitant venue rate increases I’m being quoted, and focus on live shows? There’s so safety net for Performers, and so many shows are calling it quits in 2023. As a Bawdy Patreon member, your support for Bawdy’s important work can help to ensure that it continues and that we don’t go away, too. Join Bawdy’s Patreon now and you’ll get exclusive rewards when you join (like monthly free livestream tickets at the $10/mo level and our ad-free podcast episodes) Please consider becoming a Patreon member. I need your support, now more than ever. Join the Club now at

https://www.patreon.com/Bawdy

 

Want to support Bawdy in another way? Every little bit helps, and it’s easy. Our donation links are:

 

Venmo: Venmo.com/BawdyStorytelling

Paypal: paypal.me/bawdystorytelling

Zelle: BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com

CashApp: $DixieDeLaTour

And THANK YOU!

 

Wanna work with Dixie? Do you want to learn to tell a compelling, relatable personal true story? I can help you dig deep, gain understanding and communicate with clarity. Whether it’s getting onstage, Writing a memoir, creating a podcast, or learning brand storytelling for your business, I can help. Email me at BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com and let’s make it happen.

 

Bawdy Got Me Laid perfume, Bawdy Butter & more: Dixie has created her own fragrance: You’ll love #BawdyGotMeLaid perfume, scented with golden honey, amber, ylang ylang, and warm vanilla. There’s also our (scented or unscented) creamy Bawdy Butter, Hair & Bawdy Oil, & more. Bawdy Got Me Laid Merchandise means you can deliver your own great smelling Motorboats while supporting Dixie and Bawdy. Get yours today at https://bawdystorytelling.com/merchandise

 

Check out our Bawdy Storytelling Fiends and Fans group on Facebook - it’s a place to discuss the podcast’s stories with the storytellers, share thoughts with your fellow listeners, & help Dixie make the podcast even better. Just answer 3 simple questions and you’re IN! https://www.facebook.com/groups/360169851578316/

ProTip: Subscribe to the Bawdy Storytelling email list & you’ll be notified of all upcoming storytelling workshops, livestreams, podcasts, live shows and Special Events first at

https://bawdystorytelling.com/subscribe

 

Thank you to the Team that makes this podcast possible!

Team Bawdy is:

 

Podcast Producer: Roman Den houdijker
Sound Engineer: David Grosof
Archivist / Video: Joe Moore

Bawdy Livestream pre-show video by Donal Mooney

Live-streaming by Ty McKenzie and Rubeun Tan

Storytelling support by Mosa Maxwell-Smith

& Bawdy Creator & Podcast Host Dixie De La Tour

& Thank you to Pleasure Podcasts. Bawdy Storytelling is proud to be part of your sex-positive podcast collective! 

 

Tags:

 

Trans community leader Saturday Castro Victorian bodybuilder largest Crisco fist me Pentecostal preacher daughter tutus pink safe cool down Folsom Australia Swagger like us Xavier stay Dirty Queer founder magazine hot same height beard trans twins here intimidated coffee fuck every night support endeavor photographer lesbian party Cockblock uncomfortable harnesses beards roommate wall 6/3 passing drinks outside couple hanging out extravagant people couple arms tour prude beers weed poppers thick bedroom sling king sized bed leather sheets tool chest drawers when in Rome bodybuilder jar of Crisco lube it up spreading it all around big dude bloop boyfriend


On Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bawdystorytelling/
Like us at www.Facebook.com/BawdyStorytelling
Join us on FetLife: https://fetlife.com/groups/46341
Support us on Patreon at https://www.patreon.com/Bawdy
Watch us on YouTube at http://bit.ly/BawdyTV
Find out about upcoming Podcast episodes - & Livestreams - at www.BawdyStorytelling.com/subscribe

item.title: Episode 247: ‘Jagoff Zombies‘ (William Winters)
item.itunes:title: ‘Jagoff Zombies‘ (William Winters)
item.description:
Do you find it spooky to explore new boundaries? Former political organizer & Bonobo Network founder William Winters really connects with Jamie when they speak on a panel called “Liberate your ass: sexual freedom is key in fighting the right” and their brain boners for each other are mutual. Then late one night, Jamie texts; she’s in town but sleeping on a friend’s couch, so feverish with lust, William & Jamie cast caution to the wind while they search for horizontal space to hook up before her flight home. Lessons & Takeaways: she’s an exhibitionist, and 3 feet isn’t as far as you think it is! #RulesOfEngagement #Sketchy #Consent #SexClub

 

Song: ‘Demons’ (Hayley Kiyoko)

 

About the Storyteller:

An activist, educator, and intimacy coach, William Winters is the founder and co-organizer of the Bonobo Network, an Oakland-based organization that builds community, connection, and capacity in the sex-positive and non-monogamous worlds.  William has long been an advocate for polyamory in the media, appearing in San Francisco Magazine, KQED's Forum, the San Francisco Chronicle, and the New York Times. He has facilitated conversations about polyamory and sex-positive culture in settings including university campuses, political conferences, living rooms, Burning Man, and beyond.

 

A campaign strategist by profession, a culture nerd by avocation, and a philosopher by major, William lives with his wife and their stupid cat in Oakland, CA.

 

Episode links:

 

SAN FRANCISCO: ‘This Feels Dangerous’ is happening on Friday, October 28th. Kick off Halloween weekend by donning your sexiest costume and getting Bawdy with us at the Verdi Club in San Francisco - or tune in to the Livestream, wherever you are. Tickets are on sale now at https://bawdydangerous.eventbrite.com

 

Lumi Labs: Our show this week is sponsored by Microdose.com. Microdosing was commonly used to help folx with pain, workout recovery, and anxiety…I definitely have anxiety, and I bet you do too. I found it really nice to bite into a gummy, relax and just focus on the right now. That was what they did for me, and I really enjoyed the vacation from my constant worry. And Microdose is available nationwide. Try them out. Microdose Gummies deliver perfect, entry-level doses of THC, and that can help you feel just the right amount of good. 

To learn more about microdosing THC, go to https://www.microdose.com/ and use my code: DIXIE to get free shipping & 30% off your first order. 

 

Uberlube just won Lubricant of the Year in Europe! Uberlube is a luxurious, high-grade silicone lubricant made from clean, body-friendly ingredients; it’s just silicone with a little Vitamin E. Uberlube is Dixie’s favorite lube, and they’re offering Bawdy Storytelling listeners a special offer – 10% off and free shipping when you use my code “Dixie” at https://uberlube.com/

 

Referenced in William Winters’ story: Reid Mihalko’s ‘Date your Species’ relationships series: https://reidaboutsex.com/category/date-your-species/

 

Patreon: Live shows attendance is really hit and miss lately due to COVID fears, and as we get close on a new year, I’m having a hard time figuring out where to focus my energy. As I face this new post-Lockdown frontier, do I buy new equipment for online shows? Do I agree to the exorbitant venue rate increases I’m being quoted, and focus on live shows? There’s so safety net for Performers, and so many shows are calling it quits in 2023. As a Bawdy Patreon member, your support for Bawdy’s important work can help to ensure that it continues and that we don’t go away, too. Join Bawdy’s Patreon now and you’ll get exclusive rewards when you join (like monthly free livestream tickets at the $10/mo level and our ad-free podcast episodes) Please consider becoming a Patreon member. I need your support, now more than ever. Join the Club now at

https://www.patreon.com/Bawdy

 

Want to support Bawdy in another way? Every little bit helps, and it’s easy. 

Our donation links are:

 

Venmo: Venmo.com/BawdyStorytelling

Paypal: paypal.me/bawdystorytelling

Zelle: BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com

CashApp: $DixieDeLaTour

And THANK YOU!

 

Wanna get Motorboated onstage at our next live Bawdy? Become an #ApplauseTiddies Sponsor! As a sponsor, you’re giving Dixie the ultimate form of support, you’ll get a sneak peek of your gift onstage, and you’ll get Motorboated by it. Plus you get to name my bewbs for that month (they are currently named RedBear and Michael, can you do better?) I have a Bra Registry at A Revelation in Fit in Oakland CA, so let’s do this thing, y’all! Contact BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com and let’s make a plan.

 

Wanna work with Dixie? Do you want to learn to tell a compelling, relatable personal true story? I can help you dig deep, gain understanding and communicate with clarity. Whether it’s getting onstage, Writing a memoir, creating a podcast, or learning brand storytelling for your business, I can help. Email me at BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com and let’s make it happen.

 

Bawdy Got Me Laid perfume, Bawdy Butter & more: Dixie has created her own fragrance: You’ll love #BawdyGotMeLaid perfume, scented with golden honey, amber, ylang ylang, and warm vanilla. There’s also our (scented or unscented) creamy Bawdy Butter, Hair & Bawdy Oil, & more. Bawdy Got Me Laid Merchandise means you can deliver your own great smelling Motorboats while supporting Dixie and Bawdy. Get yours today at https://bawdystorytelling.com/merchandise

 

Check out our Bawdy Storytelling Fiends and Fans group on Facebook - it’s a place to discuss the podcast’s stories with the storytellers, share thoughts with your fellow listeners, & help Dixie make the podcast even better. Just answer 3 simple questions and you’re IN! https://www.facebook.com/groups/360169851578316/

ProTip: Subscribe to the Bawdy Storytelling email list & you’ll be notified of all upcoming storytelling workshops, livestreams, podcasts, live shows and Special Events first at

https://bawdystorytelling.com/subscribe

 

Thank you to the Team that makes this podcast possible!

Team Bawdy is:

 

Podcast Producer: Roman Den houdijker
Sound Engineer: David Grosof
Archivist / Video: Joe Moore

Bawdy Livestream pre-show video by Donal Mooney

Live-streaming by Rubeun Tan and Ty McKenzie

Storytelling support by Mosa Maxwell-Smith

& Bawdy Creator & Podcast Host Dixie De La Tour

& Thank you to Pleasure Podcasts. Bawdy Storytelling is proud to be part of your sex-positive podcast collective!

parties community based know friends anonymous opening circles high possibility low expectations spaces poly snowflake interaction other life political organizer conference politicos liberate your ass sexual freedom key to Jamie progressive activists panel fighting lust at first sight physical lust older fit vivacious bright eyes curly hair megawatt smile brain boner dorks sexual tension palpable horrible wonderful things poly aspirations relationship agreements attitude date your species friendship message early workday place sofa resourceful 1:30 AM hot tubs closed Power Exchange never been there sketchy horizontal space wrong surly friendly bouncer conversation space culture consent touch asking sex club rocks off watching scene surprised single guys spaces appear jackoff zombies swarming smelled surrounded dozen men shapes sizes ethnicities pants unzipped butts stroking specific direction save us grand finale freaked out parties exhibitionist dark skin good looking raise the alarm sorry polite rules of engagement of the space kissing whispered find space downstairs cubbyholes doorless rooms chain noise rule pushed chain intense motivated challenge France torrid experience connection fault encounter cool limits communicate hotel cheap discover

item.description:
Do you shy away from new mouths and genitals after the Pandemic? Cuddle Party facilitator & emotional fermentation starter Scoby has been situationally monogamous for most of COVID, and now she’s ready to get back out there. But at her first sex-positive retreat, but she’s feeling a lot of shame about her lack of arousal - until a meditative cockstroking workshop in the rain changes everything. And this week, come meet Dixie in person this Friday October 14th at Doghouse Leathers (715 E Pike Street, Seattle WA). Let’s hang out from 6-9 PM PST at Doghouse Leathers (our Bang-O sponsor for this show!) #SwimmingInSkin #Boundaries #Consent #Desire

 

Song: ‘Them’ (Flavia)

 

About the Storyteller:

Cuddle Party facilitator & emotional fermentation starter Scoby dove into the worlds of kink and polyamory after attending a Bawdy show in 2014. She now hosts communication and consent workshops, also known as Cuddle Parties, as a certified facilitator. While she can make kombucha (like her namesake the Symbiotic Colony Of Bacteria and Yeast), she’s more of an emotional fermentation process starter and also offers intimacy coaching. She can sing you any song from Crazy Ex Girlfriend.

Episode links:

 

LIVE SHOWS:

 

SEATTLE: ‘Feels like the First Time’ is this Saturday, October 15th! We’ve just released the last few tickets to the live show, and this is our very first Livestream from Seattle so grab a ticket and watch it live. Performers include Leah Carey, Soren Berg, Kirsten Mohan, Magnolia Rouge and special musical guest  - in her first US appearance since Lockdown - the award winning Shirley Gnome! We’re so excited about this joyful reunion with our Seattle community. Tickets at

https://bit.ly/BawdySeattle2022

 

Everlywell: Everlywell at-home lab tests give you physician-reviewed results and personalized insights so you can take action on your health and wellness—all at an affordable and transparent cost. With over thirty tests, you’ll be able to choose the ones that make the most sense for you. Everlywell’s Food Sensitivity, Metabolism, Sleep & Stress, and Thyroid are just a few of the many options - and, their STD Test discreetly allows you to test for 7 types of STDs, all from the privacy of your own home. And for listeners of the show, Everlywell is offering a special discount of twenty percent off an at-home lab test at

https://www.everlywell.com/dixie  

Over one million people have trusted Everlywell with their at-home lab testing, so go to https://www.everlywell.com/dixie for twenty percent off your at-home lab test.

 

SAN FRANCISCO: ‘This Feels Dangerous is happening on Friday, October 28th. Kick off Halloween weekend by donning your sexiest costume and getting Bawdy with us at the Verdi Club - or tune in to the Livestream, wherever you are. Our Lineup of storytellers and musical performers announced soon, and Tickets are on sale now at https://bawdydangerous.eventbrite.com

 

Patreon: Live shows attendance is really hit and miss lately due to COVID fears, and as we get close on a new year, I’m having a hard time figuring out where to focus my energy. As I face this new post-Lockdown frontier, do I buy new equipment for online shows? Do I agree to the exorbitant venue rate increases I’m being quoted, and focus on live shows? There’s so safety net for Performers, and so many shows are calling it quits in 2023. As a Bawdy Patreon member, your support for Bawdy’s important work can help to ensure that it continues and that we don’t go away, too. Join Bawdy’s Patreon now and you’ll get exclusive rewards when you join (like monthly free livestream tickets at the $10/mo level and our ad-free podcast episodes) Please consider becoming a Patreon member. I need your support, now more than ever. Join the Club now at

https://www.patreon.com/Bawdy

 

Want to support Bawdy in another way? Every little bit helps, and it’s easy. 

Our donation links are:

 

Venmo: Venmo.com/BawdyStorytelling

Paypal: paypal.me/bawdystorytelling

Zelle: BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com

CashApp: $DixieDeLaTour

And THANK YOU!

 

Wanna get Motorboated onstage at our next live Bawdy? Become an #ApplauseTiddies Sponsor! As a sponsor, you’re giving Dixie the ultimate form of support, you’ll get a sneak peek of your gift onstage, and you’ll get Motorboated by it. Plus you get to name my bewbs for that month (they are currently named RedBear and Michael, can you do better?) I have a Bra Registry at A Revelation in Fit in Oakland CA, so let’s do this thing, y’all! Contact BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com and let’s make a plan.

 

Wanna work with Dixie? Do you want to learn to tell a compelling, relatable personal true story? I can help you dig deep, gain understanding and communicate with clarity. Whether it’s getting onstage, Writing a memoir, creating a podcast, or learning brand storytelling for your business, I can help. Email me at BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com and let’s make it happen.

 

Bawdy Got Me Laid perfume, Bawdy Butter & more: Dixie has created her own fragrance: You’ll love #BawdyGotMeLaid perfume, scented with golden honey, amber, ylang ylang, and warm vanilla. There’s also our (scented or unscented) creamy Bawdy Butter, Hair & Bawdy Oil, & more. Bawdy Got Me Laid Merchandise means you can deliver your own great smelling Motorboats while supporting Dixie and Bawdy. Get yours today at https://bawdystorytelling.com/merchandise

item.title: Episode 245: ‘Second Opinion / 5 Minute Warning‘ (Elizabeth Barlow and Soren Berg)
item.itunes:title: ‘Second Opinion / 5 Minute Warning‘ (Elizabeth Barlow and Soren Berg)
item.description:
Do you ever feel like your vanilla therapist really doesn’t understand your need for sadomasochistic shenanigans? Yes, graphic artist Elizabeth Barlow’s desire for rough sex and BDSM might be ‘deflecting,’ but who would know better than the hot new relationship therapist she’s hooking up with off of a dating site? Bonus story: Have you ever been invited to join in on group sex with your crush, when all you really wanted was an innocent first date? Burning Man aficionado Soren Berg hopes to summon up the courage to ask out his theme camp neighbor Textbook just as he’s beckoned to her anonymous love-in. A newbie to this, he find her tied up and blindfolded, and he only has 90 minutes to learn the rules. With just minutes left, there’s still one wish left on the white board. Can he make her final fantasy come true? This story has an explosively happy ending - and the story is still evolving, as you’ll find out on this week’s Dixie Ramble.

 

This week: Come meet Dixie in person in these cities:

 

Portland Meetup: Wed October 12th 6-9 PM PST

At Bar Bar, 3943 N Mississippi Portland OR

 

Seattle Meet n Greet: Friday Oct 14th 6-9 PM PST

At Doghouse Leathers, 715 E Pike St Seattle WA 

(please support our new Bang-O Sponsor, Doghouse Leathers!)

 

About the Storytellers:

 

Elizabeth Barlow is a bisexual storyteller and artist who draws comics about queer life. She is rarely without her sketchpad, brushpens, and something loud to say.

 

Soren Berg lives in Seattle, where he is busy filling out his Pacific Northwest bingo card of hiking, camping, skiing, biking, and working in tech. He enjoys the polyamorous commune life, replete with many group adventures and the occasional kinky sex party.  The Seattle October 15th live show will be his fourth story for Bawdy.

 

Episode links:

 

Lumi Labs: Our show this week is sponsored by Microdose.com. Microdosing was commonly used to help folx with pain, workout recovery, and anxiety…I definitely have anxiety, and I bet you do too. I found it really nice to bite into a gummy, relax and just focus on the right now. That was what they did for me, and I really enjoyed the vacation from my constant worry. And Microdose is available nationwide. Try them out. Microdose Gummies deliver perfect, entry-level doses of THC, and that can help you feel just the right amount of good. 

To learn more about microdosing THC, go to https://www.microdose.com/ and use my code: DIXIE to get free shipping & 30% off your first order. 

 

Uberlube just won Lubricant of the Year in Europe! Uberlube is a luxurious, high-grade silicone lubricant made from clean, body-friendly ingredients; it’s just silicone with a little Vitamin E. Uberlube is Dixie’s favorite lube, and they’re offering Bawdy Storytelling listeners a special offer – 10% off and free shipping when you use my code “Dixie” at https://uberlube.com/

 

LIVE SHOWS:

 

SEATTLE: ‘Feels like the First Time’ is happening on Saturday, October 15th! The live show is currently sold out (watch for more tickets), but our Livestream tickets are plentiful so grab yours now. Performers include Leah Carey, Soren Berg, Kirsten Mohan, Magnolia Rouge and special musical guest  - in her first US appearance since Lockdown - the award winning Shirley Gnome! We’re so excited about this joyful reunion with our Seattle community. Tickets at

https://bit.ly/BawdySeattle2022

 

SAN FRANCISCO: ‘This Feels Dangerous is happening on Friday, October 28th. Kick off Halloween weekend by donning your sexiest costume and getting Bawdy with us at the Verdi Club - or tune in to the Livestream, wherever you are. Our Lineup of storytellers and musical performers announced soon, and Tickets are on sale now at https://bawdydangerous.eventbrite.com

 

Patreon: Live shows attendance is really hit and miss lately due to COVID fears, and as we get close to a new year, I’m trying to figure out where to focus my energy. As I face this new frontier, do I buy new equipment for online shows? Do I agree to the exorbitant venue rate increases I’m being quoted, and focus on live shows? There’s so safety net for Performers, and so many shows are calling it quits in 2023. As a Bawdy Patreon member, your support for Bawdy’s important work can help to ensure that it continues and that we don’t go away, too. Join Bawdy’s Patreon now and you’ll get exclusive rewards when you join (like monthly free livestream tickets at the $10/mo level and our ad-free podcast episodes) Please consider becoming a Patreon member. I need your support, now more than ever. Join the Club now at

Patreon: Live shows attendance is really hit and miss lately due to COVID fears, and as we get close to a new year, I’m trying to figure out where to focus my energy. As I face this new frontier, do I buy new equipment for online shows? Do I agree to the exorbitant venue rate increases I’m being quoted, and focus on live shows? There’s so safety net for Performers, and so many shows are calling it quits in 2023. As a Bawdy Patreon member, your support for Bawdy’s important work can help to ensure that it continues and that we don’t go away, too. And THANK YOU!

Plus you get to name my bewbs for that month (they are currently named RedBear and Michael, can you do better?) I have a Bra Registry at A Revelation in Fit in Oakland CA, so let’s do this thing, y’all! Contact BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com and let’s make a plan.

 

Wanna work with Dixie? Do you want to learn to tell a compelling, relatable personal true story? I can help you dig deep, gain understanding and communicate with clarity. item.title: Episode 244: ‘Please Beg Me‘ (Leland Carina)
item.itunes:title: ‘Please Beg Me‘ (Leland Carina)
item.description:
Do you need permission to ask for exactly what you want? When nonbinary queer switch and writer Leland Carina interviews Sarge and the GangBang Girls for an article in Leatherati.com, she is so impressed with what they do. As Leland marvels at 1) The 100% Consent-based Fantasy Fulfillment 2) The Negotiation that goes into each Scene 3) The Menu of Gang Bang styles that they offer, Leland realize that this is more than a mere writing assignment. This is a way to introduce someone they love to some next level pleasure (with their consent, of course) - and a chance to experience it, too! #Safe #Celebratory #Cathartic #Surprise #Public #Private #MilitaryTakedown

 

Song: ‘Religion’ (Zand)

 

About the Storyteller:

 

Leland Carina is a Bay Area artist, writer, performer, and teacher. She first came into leather over a decade ago in San Francisco. She has authored an extensive number of articles that have been published by Leatherati.com, PQ Monthly, SALACIOUS magazine, Kink.com, and more. Her photography has been shown at the Mark I Chester gallery, in SF Weekly, and in countless sexy PR campaigns. She has modeled for Folsom Street Fair, the Portland Dykes on Bikes, graced the cover of the SF Bay Guardian, and has been a bondage and fetish model for many photographers. She was named Leather Marshal of the SF Pride Parade in 2012 and Ms Oregon State Leather in 2018.

Leland identifies as a non-binary queer switch and She/her or they/them pronouns work. She’s a Femme Daddy and a power bottom who deeply enjoys D/s dynamics and hard play. In her spare time, she enjoys designing and creating her own latex outfits, beekeeping, and indulging her fetish for collecting plants.

 

Episode links:

 

Uberlube: Uberlube is a luxurious, high-grade silicone lubricant made from clean, body-friendly ingredients; it’s just silicone with a little Vitamin E. Uberlube is Dixie’s favorite lube, and they’re offering Bawdy Storytelling listeners a special offer – 10% off and free shipping when you use my code “Dixie” at UberLube.com. Patreon: Live shows are so hit and miss lately, and as we get close to a new year, I’m trying to figure out where to focus my energy. Do I spend money on equipment for online shows? Do I spend money on the exorbitant venues rate increases? There’s so safety net for Performers, esp after the pandemic. Join the family now at

https://www.patreon.com/Bawdy

 

Want to support Bawdy in another way? Every bit helps, and it’s easy.

CashApp: $DixieDeLaTour

And THANK YOU!

As a sponsor, you choose the bra, you’ll get a sneak peek at it onstage, and you’ll get Motorboated in it, plus you get to name my bewbs for that month (they are currently named RedBear and Michael, can you do better?). I have a Bra Registry at A Revelation in Fit in Oakland CA, so let’s do this thing, y’all! Contact BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com and let’s make a plan.

 

Wanna work with Dixie? Do you want to learn to tell a compelling, relatable personal true story? I can help you dig deep, gain understanding and communicate with clarity. item.itunes:title: ‘Disappointed Gymnast‘ (Michael Patrick Duggan)
item.description:
Ever been hit on in a gay bar by an Olympic Gymnast with a fetish for older men? Writer and cartoonist Michael Patrick Duggan is feeling tired and single, and he’s ready to pack it in (why do they keep playing Gwen Stefani here, anyway?) when an Angel flies in from Planet Blowjob and invites him home to see his jockstrap. Things look promising until the gymnast whips out some Japanese tequila and becomes an elven wizard, and now the cops are on the way. Aren’t we ever gonna get to the gay stuff? #PoleVault #Chernobyl #IKnowHowThisWorksImIrish

 

Song: ‘Get Some’ (Ghosted)

 

About the Storyteller:

 

Michael Patrick Duggan is a writer and cartoonist. His latest novel is Poison & Power: Goldenheart Mysteries Book 1. He is also known for his coloring book series, including Mythical Women, Mandalas & Punctuation Marks, Myths & Monsters: Books 1 thru 3, and Moon Princesses & Space Monsters.

 

Find out more about Michael Patrick at:

HYPERLINK "http://mpatrickduggan.net/"mpatrickduggan.net

HYPERLINK "https://www.amazon.com/M-Patrick-Duggan/e/B072NCKHNZ"https://www.amazon.com/M-Patrick-Duggan/e/B072NCKHNZ

item.content:encoded:
Ever been hit on in a gay bar by an Olympic Gymnast with a fetish for older men? Writer and cartoonist Michael Patrick Duggan is feeling tired and single, and he’s ready to pack it in (why do they keep playing Gwen Stefani here, anyway?) when an Angel flies in from Planet Blowjob and invites him home to see his jockstrap. Things look promising until the gymnast whips out some Japanese tequila and becomes an elven wizard, and now the cops are on the way. Aren’t we ever gonna get to the gay stuff? #PoleVault #Chernobyl #IKnowHowThisWorksImIrish

 

Song: ‘Get Some’ (Ghosted)

 

About the Storyteller:

 

Michael Patrick Duggan is a writer and cartoonist. His latest novel is Poison & Power: Goldenheart Mysteries Book 1. He is also known for his coloring book series, including Mythical Women, Mandalas & Punctuation Marks, Myths & Monsters: Books 1 thru 3, and Moon Princesses & Space Monsters.

 

Find out more about Michael Patrick at:

HYPERLINK "http://mpatrickduggan.net/"mpatrickduggan.net

Get his coloring books and novel at

HYPERLINK "https://www.amazon.com/M-Patrick-Duggan/e/B072NCKHNZ"https://www.amazon.com/M-Patrick-Duggan/e/B072NCKHNZ

 

Episode links:

 

Dipsea is an app full of hundreds of short, sexy audio stories designed by women, for women. They bring scenarios to life with immersive soundscapes and characters, no matter who you’re into or what turns you on. New content is released every week, so in between listening to your favorite stories, again and again, you can always find something new to explore.

And for listeners of this show, Dipsea is offering an extended 30 day free trial when you go to

DipseaStories.com/DIXIE

 

LIVE SHOWS:

 

SAN FRANCISCO: It’s our FINAL Kinktacular Show for Folsom Street Fair! On Sunday September 25th, join us after the Fair for true stories from infamous Sex-Positive figures like Film and TV Director Madison Young, Author Janet Hardy, Leathermen’s Discussion Group’s Al Rahm Lujan, Kinkster Dolan Wolf and more. Buy tickets for the live event or you can watch from anywhere on the Livestream: Tickets at

https://bit.ly/BawdyKinktacular2022

 

SEATTLE: Bawdy Storytelling’s ‘Feels like the First Time’ is on Saturday, October 15th! It’s been almost 3 years since we did Bawdy in Seattle, and now we’ve got a new venue, new storytellers who are flying in to be on the Bawdy stage cause they’ve heard the Seattle audience is incredible, and we’re so excited about this joyful reunion with our Seattle community. Tell your friends about this Bawdy Live Event, and buy Tickets now at

HYPERLINK "https://bit.ly/BawdySeattle2022"https://bit.ly/BawdySeattle2022

 

Everlywell: Everlywell at-home lab tests give you physician-reviewed results and personalized insights so you can take action on your health and wellness—all at an affordable and transparent cost. With over thirty tests, you’ll be able to choose the ones that make the most sense for you. Everlywell’s Food Sensitivity, Metabolism, Sleep & Stress, and Thyroid are just a few of the many options - and, their STD Test discreetly allows you to test for 7 types of STDs, all from the privacy of your own home. And for listeners of the show, Everlywell is offering a special discount of twenty percent off an at-home lab test at

HYPERLINK "https://www.everlywell.com/dixie"https://www.everlywell.com/dixie 

Over one million people have trusted Everlywell with their at-home lab testing, so go to https://www.everlywell.com/dixie for twenty percent off your at-home lab test.

 

Patreon: If you love this podcast, join the Club and become a Bawdy’s Patreon member. People like you who support this important work that we do, people who want these stories where you are. Join Bawdy’s Patreon now and you get exclusive rewards when you join (like monthly free livestream tickets at the $10/mo level and ad-free episodes) Bawdy needs your support. Become a member now at

HYPERLINK "https://www.patreon.com/Bawdy"https://www.patreon.com/Bawdy

 

Want to support Bawdy in another way? Every bit helps, and it’s easy.

Our donation links are:

 

Venmo: Venmo.com/BawdyStorytelling

Paypal: HYPERLINK "https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/my/profile"paypal.me/bawdystorytelling

Zelle: HYPERLINK "mailto:BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com"BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com

CashApp: $DixieDeLaTour

And THANK YOU!

 

Wanna get Motorboated onstage at our next live Bawdy? Become an #ApplauseTiddies Sponsor! As a sponsor, you choose the bra, you’ll get a sneak peek at it onstage, and you’ll get Motorboated in it, plus you get to name my bewbs for that month (they are currently named RedBear and Michael, can you do better?). I have a Bra Registry at A Revelation in Fit in Oakland CA, so let’s do this thing, y’all! Contact HYPERLINK "mailto:BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com"BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com and let’s make a plan.

 

Wanna work with Dixie? Do you want to learn to tell a compelling, relatable personal true story? I can help you dig deep, gain understanding and communicate with clarity. Whether it’s getting ontage, Writing a memoir, creating a podcast, or learning brand storytelling for your business, I can help. Email me at BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com and let’s make it happen.

 

Bawdy Got Me Laid perfume, Bawdy Butter & more: Dixie has created her own fragrance: You’ll love #BawdyGotMeLaid perfume, scented with golden honey, amber, ylang ylang, and warm vanilla. There’s also our (scented or unscented) creamy Bawdy Butter, Hair & Bawdy Oil, & more. Bawdy Got Me Laid Merchandise means you can deliver your own great smelling Motorboats while supporting Dixie and Bawdy. item.itunes:title: ‘Master, Mister or Muse‘ (Tanya Gilstrap)
item.description:
Have you checked ‘Best Threesome’ off your Google Spreadsheet? Queer Polyamorous Ethical Slut Tanya Gilstrap has just figured out that they enjoy being a service top, and is really sure that sex is great with their new partners Luna and Jacob. But are they ready for the next step: sex and drugs with them? Let’s find out. And now that the drugs are kicking in: who’s in Control? Which one of you do I call Sir? And hey, will you beat me with this Frisbee? #ChangingRoles #Endorphins #ThankYouGhosts

 

About the Storyteller:

 

Tanya Gilstrap is basically a Seattle local, even though they were born in California. They’re queer, polyamorous and an ethical slut. Tanya’s been a member of the Seattle Bawdy family for years, either taking photos at the event, acting as stage mgr or getting up and telling stories of their own. Tanya was thrilled to win Seattle's Best of Bawdy contest because they LOVE talking about Sex and Novelty. Is there anything better?!

 

Song: ‘Homemade Dynamite’ (Lorde)

 

Episode links:

 

Helix: Ready for better sleep? Helix Sleep has a quiz that takes just two minutes to complete and matches your body type and sleep preferences to the perfect mattress for you. Helix was awarded the #1 best overall mattress pick of 2020 and by GQ and Wired Magazine. Just go to HelixSleep.com/Dixie, take their two-minute sleep quiz, and they’ll match you to a customized mattress that will give you the best sleep of your life. 

Special Offer: right now, Helix is offering up to $200 off all mattress orders AND two free pillows to listeners of the Bawdy Storytelling podcast. That’s HelixSleep.com/Dixie for up to 200 dollars off and two free pillows!

 

LIVE SHOWS:

 

Bawdy Storytelling returns to live shows with Kinktacular on Sunday, September 25th! We’re celebrating Folsom Street Fair - that most high of Holy Days for Kinksters - with our big Folsom Kinktacular. We’re an Official Folsom Street Fair event, so join us after the Fair; we’ve got infamous perverts like Madison Young, Author Janet Hardy, Leathermen Discussion Group’s Al Rahm Lujan. Buy tickets for the live performance, or you can watch from anywhere on the Livestream: Tickets at

https://bit.ly/BawdyKinktacular2022

 

Bawdy Storytelling’s ‘Feels like the First Time’ will be in Seattle on Saturday, October 15th and I’ve just confirmed 2 brand new storytellers for this show! Have you pitched me your story yet? It’s been almost 3 years since we did Bawdy in Seattle, and now we’ve got a new venue, new storytellers who are flying in cause they’ve heard the Seattle audience is incredible and we’re so excited about this joyful reunion with our Seattle community. Tell your friends about Bawdy’s return, and buy Tickets now at

https://bit.ly/BawdySeattle2022

 

Patreon: If you love this podcast, you can thank Bawdy’s Patreon supporters - they made this happen! It’s because of people like you who support this important work that we do, people who want these stories wherever they are. Join our Patreon now and you get exclusive rewards when you join (like monthly free livestream tickets at the $10/mo level!) Become a member now at

https://www.patreon.com/Bawdy

 

Want to support Bawdy in another way? Every bit helps, and it’s easy. Our links are:

 

Venmo: Venmo.com/BawdyStorytelling

Paypal: paypal.me/bawdystorytelling

Zelle: BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com

CashApp: $DixieDeLaTour

And THANK YOU!

 

Wanna get Motorboated onstage at our next live Bawdy? Become an #ApplauseTiddies Sponsor! As a sponsor, you choose the bra, you’ll get a sneak peek at it onstage, and you’ll get Motorboated in it, plus you get to name my bewbs for that month (they are currently named RedBear and Michael, can you do better?). I have a Bra Registry at A Revelation in Fit in Oakland CA, so let’s do this thing, y’all! Contact BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com and let’s make a plan.

 

Wanna work with Dixie? Do you want to learn to tell a compelling, relatable personal true story? I can help you dig deep, gain understanding and communicate with clarity. Whether it’s getting ontage, Writing a memoir, creating a podcast, or learning brand storytelling for your business, I can help. Email me at BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com and let’s make it happen.

 

Bawdy Got Me Laid perfume, Bawdy Butter & more: Dixie has created her own fragrance: You’ll love #BawdyGotMeLaid perfume, scented with golden honey, amber, ylang ylang, and warm vanilla. There’s also our (scented or unscented) creamy Bawdy Butter, Hair & Bawdy Oil, & more. Bawdy Got Me Laid Merchandise means you can deliver your own great smelling Motorboats while supporting Dixie and Bawdy. Get yours today at https://bawdystorytelling.com/merchandise

 

Check out our Bawdy Storytelling Fiends and Fans group on Facebook - it’s a place to discuss the podcast’s stories with the storytellers, share thoughts with your fellow listeners, & help Dixie make the podcast even better. Just answer 3 simple questions and you’re IN! https://www.facebook.com/groups/360169851578316/

item.content:encoded:
Have you checked ‘Best Threesome’ off your Google Spreadsheet? Queer Polyamorous Ethical Slut Tanya Gilstrap has just figured out that they enjoy being a service top, and is really sure that sex is great with their new partners Luna and Jacob. But are they ready for the next step: sex and drugs with them? Let’s find out. And now that the drugs are kicking in: who’s in Control? Which one of you do I call Sir? And hey, will you beat me with this Frisbee? #ChangingRoles #Endorphins #ThankYouGhosts

 

About the Storyteller:

 

Tanya Gilstrap is basically a Seattle local, even though they were born in California. They’re queer, polyamorous and an ethical slut. Tanya’s been a member of the Seattle Bawdy family for years, either taking photos at the event, acting as stage mgr or getting up and telling stories of their own. Tanya was thrilled to win Seattle's Best of Bawdy contest because they LOVE talking about Sex and Novelty. Is there anything better?!

 

Song: ‘Homemade Dynamite’ (Lorde)

 

Episode links:

 

Helix: Ready for better sleep? Helix Sleep has a quiz that takes just two minutes to complete and matches your body type and sleep preferences to the perfect mattress for you. Helix was awarded the #1 best overall mattress pick of 2020 and by GQ and Wired Magazine. Just go to HelixSleep.com/Dixie, take their two-minute sleep quiz, and they’ll match you to a customized mattress that will give you the best sleep of your life. 

Special Offer: right now, Helix is offering up to $200 off all mattress orders AND two free pillows to listeners of the Bawdy Storytelling podcast. That’s HelixSleep.com/Dixie for up to 200 dollars off and two free pillows!

item.title: 240: ‘Bloody Handprint‘ (Mollena Williams-Haas)
item.itunes:title: ‘Bloody Handprint‘ (Mollena Williams-Haas)
item.description:
Can a Viking teach you to have fun when you’re bleeding? Infamous storyteller Mollena Lee Williams-Haas goes on on a pervert tour of Europe, spontaneously deciding to accept an invite from a fan in Oslo. They both know this evening will end up in sex - but when she tries to explain that her period has arrived unexpectedly, he shows her a new appreciation for that time of the month. No wonder these folks conquered the fucking planet! #Celebrate #Menstruation #KnowYourNegro #Sober

 

Song: ‘Warm, Bloody and Tender’ (Rachel Lark)

Watch the official music video (Dixie’s in it!) at

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IGx4OLuE_xU

About the Storyteller:

 

Larger than life, phat as hell, whipsmart AND smart about whips, Mollena Lee Williams-Haas:  [aka "The Perverted Negress" aka "Mo" aka "Pony Oracle," but that is a longer tail] is a performer, storyteller, BDSM/Kink/Leather/AlternativeLifestyle Educatrix, Executive Pervert, librettist and Muse. She is beloved by and in service to her "Spousemeister," legendary contemporary music composer Georg Friedrich Haas.

Mollena is an outspoken footsoldier in the fight against bigotry and ignorance and a thought-leader in the world of Power Exchange dynamics. AND hey, she's been sober since 2007 and has a hard-on for living life fully and unabashedly. 

 

Learn more at https://www.mollena.com/ or on her podcast 'All that and Mo’ (available wherever you listen to podcasts).

 

Episode links:

 

Everlywell: Everlywell at-home lab tests give you physician-reviewed results and personalized insights so you can take action on your health and wellness—all at an affordable and transparent cost. With over thirty tests, you’ll be able to choose the ones that make the most sense for you. Everlywell’s Food Sensitivity, Metabolism, Sleep & Stress, and Thyroid are just a few of the many options - and, their STD Test discreetly allows you to test for 7 types of STDs, all from the privacy of your own home. And for listeners of the show, Everlywell is offering a special discount of twenty percent off an at-home lab test at

https://www.everlywell.com/dixie  

Over one million people have trusted Everlywell with their at-home lab testing, so go to https://www.everlywell.com/dixie for twenty percent off your at-home lab test.

Can a Viking teach you to have fun when you’re bleeding? Infamous storyteller Mollena Lee Williams-Haas goes on on a pervert tour of Europe, spontaneously deciding to accept an invite from a fan in Oslo. They both know this evening will end up in sex - but when she tries to explain that her period has arrived unexpectedly, he shows her a new appreciation for that time of the month. No wonder these folks conquered the fucking planet! #Celebrate #Menstruation #KnowYourNegro #Sober

 

Song: ‘Warm, Bloody and Tender’ (Rachel Lark)

Watch the official music video (Dixie’s in it!) at

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IGx4OLuE_xU

About the Storyteller:

 

Larger than life, phat as hell, whipsmart AND smart about whips, Mollena Lee Williams-Haas:  [aka "The Perverted Negress" aka "Mo" aka "Pony Oracle," but that is a longer tail] is a performer, storyteller, BDSM/Kink/Leather/AlternativeLifestyle Educatrix, Executive Pervert, librettist and Muse. She is beloved by and in service to her "Spousemeister," legendary contemporary music composer Georg Friedrich Haas.

Mollena is an outspoken footsoldier in the fight against bigotry and ignorance and a thought-leader in the world of Power Exchange dynamics. AND hey, she's been sober since 2007 and has a hard-on for living life fully and unabashedly. 

 

Learn more at https://www.mollena.com/ or on her podcast 'All that and Mo’ (available wherever you listen to podcasts).

item.itunes:title: ‘Winning‘ (Sarah Dopp)
item.description:
Have you ever stimulated a prostate through a vagina? Queer neurodivergent artist & coach Sarah Dopp encounters a generous & tech-savvy stranger on the internet, & they soon become gender identity penpals. And when Sarah discovers that Meredith has transitioned but hasn’t actually tried out her new vagina yet, she immediately hops a plane to Australia to help out because your first time should be with someone who cares about both you, and your pleasure. #Trans #LetsFindOutWhatThisThingCanDo #LikeThePastNeverHappened

 

You can watch the (10 year old!) video at

 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zwnRqZ5ulBE

 

Song: ‘Make Me Feel’ (Janelle Monae)

About the Storyteller:

 

Sarah Dopp is queer neurodivergent artist and certified ADHD coach living in the San Francisco Bay Area. Some of her past projects include Queer ADHD, a coaching community for the LGBTQ community, as well as Genderfork, a community expression blog for gender diversity. More of her voice can be found on TikTok or Instagram under @sarahdoppify.

 

Episode links:

 

Dipsea is an app full of hundreds of short, sexy audio stories designed by women, for women. They bring scenarios to life with immersive soundscapes and characters, no matter who you’re into or what turns you on. New content is released every week, so in between listening to your favorite stories, again and again, you can always find something new to explore.

And for listeners of this show, Dipsea is offering an extended 30 day free trial when you go to 

DipseaStories.com/DIXIE

 

Bawdy Storytelling San Francisco: We’re celebrating Folsom Street Fair - that most high of Holy Days for Kinksters - with the Bawdy Folsom Kinktacular. Patreon: If you love this podcast, you can thank Bawdy’s Patreon supporters - they made this happen! It’s because of people like you who support this important work that we do, people who want these stories wherever they are. Join our Patreon now and you get exclusive rewards when you join (like monthly free livestream tickets at the $10/mo level!) Become a member now at

https://www.patreon.com/Bawdy

 

Not a fan of the Patreon model? 

Want to support Bawdy in another way? 

Here are other ways to make donating easy:

 

Venmo: Venmo.com/BawdyStorytelling

Paypal: paypal.me/bawdystorytelling

Zelle: BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com

CashApp: $DixieDeLaTour

And THANK YOU!

 

Wanna work with Dixie on Private Story Coaching?Storytelling for Self-Discovery can help you find, create and polish your own stories (this is my one-on-one private coaching option, and a recent client said ‘OMG, you just saved me 2 years of therapy, Dixie!’ Why? Because together, we do the work and find what that story is really about for you) Do you want learn to tell a compelling, relatable personal true story? I can help you dig deep, gain understanding and communicate with clarity. Writing a memoir, creating a podcast, or want to learn brand storytelling for your business or another story-related endeavor? Email me at BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com and let’s make it happen.

 

Bawdy Got Me Laid perfume, Bawdy Butter & more: Dixie has created her own fragrance: You’ll love #BawdyGotMeLaid perfume, scented with golden honey, amber, ylang ylang, and warm vanilla. There’s also our (scented or unscented) creamy Bawdy Butter, Hair & Bawdy Oil, & more. Bawdy Got Me Laid Merchandise means you can deliver your own great smelling Motorboats while supporting Dixie and Bawdy. Get yours today at https://bawdystorytelling.com/merchandise

 

Check out our Bawdy Storytelling Fiends and Fans group on Facebook - it’s a place to discuss the podcast’s stories with the storytellers, share thoughts with your fellow listeners, & help Dixie make the podcast even better. Just answer 3 simple questions and you’re IN! https://www.facebook.com/groups/360169851578316/

Quake is gone. My dog Quake was Sainted by the Sisters of Perpetual Indulgence recently, so if you need some extra love or luck, you’ve got a Saint on your side! I am so proud and happy that this honor has been bestowed on him; It makes his death a tiny bit easier.

If you wanna help out with Quake’s End of Life/final Veterinary expenses, the GoFundMe is at 

https://bit.ly/QuakeTheSaint

He was the Love of my Life, and I’ll never get over this loss.

P.S. Thank you for loving Quake, too. <3

item.title: Episode 238: ‘Making Love to the Universe‘ (Misha Bonaventura)
item.itunes:title: ‘Making Love to the Universe‘ (Misha Bonaventura)
item.description:
Can Sex Parties empower you to heal your lifelong insecurities? Bonobo Network co-producer Misha Bonaventura is invited to an intimate acid-induced birthday experience and as she looks around at the beautiful bodies at this drug-fueled orgy, she sets an intention; Does she want to make love to her friends and compatriots tonight, or does she want to make love to time, and to the meaning of life? As she dances and rejoices in the sights and the orgasms of the luminaries around her, she suddenly finds herself singled out by the cosmos - and everyone else notices it, too. #Insecure #Excluded #YouBelong

 

Song: ‘Disco Tits’ (Tove Lo)

About the Storyteller:

 

Misha Bonaventura co-produces the Bonobo Network - a  High Possibility, Low Expectation sex-positive community - alongside its founder, William Winters. She teaches and consults individuals and communities to develop their consent culture with a harm reduction and transformative justice lens. She is passionate about supporting sex positive community and helping people create more pleasure for themselves. 

Her private practice, Clearing Conversations, focuses on conflict resolution and communication coaching. Misha loves supporting the sex positive community of the Bay Area and beyond in creating sustainable, long-term relationship building.

 

Bonobo Network:
https://www.bonobonetwork.com/

 

Clearing Conversations:

http://www.clearingconversations.com/

 

Episode links:

 

Everlywell: Everlywell at-home lab tests give you physician-reviewed results and personalized insights so you can take action on your health and wellness—all at an affordable and transparent cost. With over thirty tests, you’ll be able to choose the ones that make the most sense for you. Everlywell’s Food Sensitivity, Metabolism, Sleep & Stress, and Thyroid are just a few of the many options - and, their STD Test discreetly allows you to test for 7 types of STDs, all from the privacy of your own home. And for listeners of the show, Everlywell is offering a special discount of twenty percent off an at-home lab test at

https://www.everlywell.com/dixie  

Over one million people have trusted Everlywell with their at-home lab testing, so go to https://www.everlywell.com/dixie for twenty percent off your at-home lab test.

 

Helix: Ready for better sleep? Helix Sleep has a quiz that takes just two minutes to complete and matches your body type and sleep preferences to the perfect mattress for you. Helix was awarded the #1 best overall mattress pick of 2020 and by GQ and Wired Magazine. Just go to HelixSleep.com/Dixie, take their two-minute sleep quiz, and they’ll match you to a customized mattress that will give you the best sleep of your life. 

Special Offer: right now, Helix is offering up to $200 off all mattress orders AND two free pillows to listeners of the Bawdy Storytelling podcast. That’s HelixSleep.com/Dixie for up to 200 dollars off and two free pillows!

 

When’s the next Bawdy in San Francisco? We’re celebrating Folsom Street Fair - that most high of Holy Days for Kinksters - with the Bawdy Folsom Kinktacular. We’ve got VIP tables for 2 or 4, Reserved and General Admission Seating, icy cold cocktails with dirty names and a seat for your butt after all that carousing in the sun at the Fair. Buy tickets for the live performance, or you can watch from anywhere on the Livestream: Tickets at

https://BawdyKinktacular2022.eventbrite.com

 

Bawdy returns to Seattle on Saturday, October 15th: It’s been almost 3 years, and now we’ve got a new venue, we’ll have brand new storytellers (have you pitched me your story? I just landed 2 tellers for this show!) and we’re so excited about this joyful reunion with the best community anywhere. Tell your friends about Bawdy’s return to Seattle, learn more about the show and buy Tickets at

https://bit.ly/BawdySeattle2022

 

Wanna get Motorboated onstage at our next live Bawdy? Become an #ApplauseTiddies Sponsor! As a sponsor, you choose the bra, you’ll get a sneak peek at it onstage, and you’ll get Motorboated in it, plus you get to name my bewbs for that month (they are currently named RedBear and Michael, can you do better?). I have a Bra Registry at A Revelation in Fit in Oakland CA, so let’s do this thing, y’all! Contact BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com and let’s make a plan.

 

Patreon: If you love this podcast, you can thank Bawdy’s Patreon supporters - they made this happen! It’s because of people like you who support this important work that we do, people who want these stories wherever they are. Join our Patreon now and you get exclusive rewards when you join (like monthly free livestream tickets at the $10/mo level!) Become a member now at

https://www.patreon.com/Bawdy

 

Not a fan of the Patreon model? 

Want to support Bawdy in another way? 

Here are other ways to make donating easy:

 

Venmo: Venmo.com/BawdyStorytelling

Paypal: paypal.me/bawdystorytelling

Zelle: BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com

CashApp: $DixieDeLaTour

And THANK YOU!

 

Hire Me for Private Story Coaching: Storytelling for Self-Discovery can help you find, create and polish your own stories (this is my one-on-one private coaching option, and a recent client said ‘OMG, you just saved me 2 years of therapy, Dixie!’ Why? Because together, we do the work and find what that story is really about for you) Do you want learn to tell a compelling, relatable personal true story? I can help you dig deep, gain understanding and communicate with clarity. Writing a memoir, creating a podcast, or want to learn brand storytelling for your business or another story-related endeavor? Email me at BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com and let’s make it happen.

 

Bawdy Got Me Laid perfume, Bawdy Butter & more: Dixie has created her own fragrance: You’ll love #BawdyGotMeLaid perfume, scented with golden honey, amber, ylang ylang, and warm vanilla. There’s also our (scented or unscented) creamy Bawdy Butter, Hair & Bawdy Oil, & more. Bawdy Got Me Laid Merchandise means you can deliver your own great smelling Motorboats while supporting Dixie and Bawdy. Get yours today at https://bawdystorytelling.com/merchandise

 

Check out our Bawdy Storytelling Fiends and Fans group on Facebook - it’s a place to discuss the podcast’s stories with the storytellers, share thoughts with your fellow listeners, & help Dixie make the podcast even better. Just answer 3 simple questions and you’re IN! https://www.facebook.com/groups/360169851578316/

Quake is gone.

Quake was Sainted by the Sisters of Perpetual Indulgence this past week, so if you need some extra love or luck, you’ve got a Saint on your side! I am so proud and happy that this honor has been bestowed on him; It makes his death a tiny bit easier.

If you wanna help out with Quake’s End of Life/final Veterinary expenses, the GoFundMe is at 

https://bit.ly/QuakeTheSaint

He was the Love of my Life, and I’ll never get over this loss.

P.S. Thank you for loving Quake, too. <3

 

ProTip: Subscribe to the Bawdy Storytelling email list & you’ll be notified of all upcoming storytelling workshops, livestreams, podcasts, live shows and Special Events first at

https://bawdystorytelling.com/subscribe

 

Thank you to the Team that makes this podcast possible!

Team Bawdy is:

 

Podcast Producer: Roman Den houdijker
Sound Engineer: David Grosof
Archivist / Video: Joe Moore

Bawdy Livestream pre-show video by Donal Mooney

Live-streaming by Rubeun Tan

Storytelling support by Mosa Maxwell-Smith (!!!)

& Bawdy Creator & Podcast Host Dixie De La Tour

& Thank you to Pleasure Podcasts. Bawdy Storytelling is proud to be part of your sex-positive podcast collective!

pixie skilled lovers tall blonde big bold excited crew skin glow fireplace giggles playfulness attract me energy solid calm sit center bed meditatively kicks in time bends life starts to blur mental adventure body turned on connected crystal hot scene amazing connection community stan insecurity included clear you belong ever feel excluded holding space pleasure high school parties business partner creator motivation unique place potential orgies unique everything want threesome moresomes flogging everything escape jealousy belonging attractive left out high school friend room psychedelic sex positive luminaries experience of a lifetime kind loving Kermit the Frog Albert Einstein closest friends acid trip sex educator queers ecstatic dance DJs Marin Headlands San Francisco flogging fisting fucking Romi cross kind loving responsible innovator intentionally gathered shepherd acid-induced huge AirBnB Hot tub huge bathtub opening circle flip n fucks cushion filled lounge consent talk house logistics name dig deep open life centered expand new place fulfill my purpose passes out the acid kick in connection games soak hot tub scamper master bedroom fiery

On Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bawdystorytelling/

item.content:encoded:
Can Sex Parties empower you to heal your lifelong insecurities? Bonobo Network co-producer Misha Bonaventura is invited to an intimate acid-induced birthday experience and as she looks around at the beautiful bodies at this drug-fueled orgy, she sets an intention; Does she want to make love to her friends and compatriots tonight, or does she want to make love to time, and to the meaning of life? As she dances and rejoices in the sights and the orgasms of the luminaries around her, she suddenly finds herself singled out by the cosmos - and everyone else notices it, too. #Insecure #Excluded #YouBelong

 

Song: ‘Disco Tits’ (Tove Lo)

About the Storyteller:

 

Misha Bonaventura co-produces the Bonobo Network - a  High Possibility, Low Expectation sex-positive community - alongside its founder, William Winters. She teaches and consults individuals and communities to develop their consent culture with a harm reduction and transformative justice lens. She is passionate about supporting sex positive community and helping people create more pleasure for themselves. 

Her private practice, Clearing Conversations, focuses on conflict resolution and communication coaching. Misha loves supporting the sex positive community of the Bay Area and beyond in creating sustainable, long-term relationship building.

 

Bonobo Network:https://www.bonobonetwork.com/

 

Clearing Conversations:

http://www.clearingconversations.com/

 

Episode links:

 

Everlywell: Everlywell at-home lab tests give you physician-reviewed results and personalized insights so you can take action on your health and wellness—all at an affordable and transparent cost. With over thirty tests, you’ll be able to choose the ones that make the most sense for you. Everlywell’s Food Sensitivity, Metabolism, Sleep & Stress, and Thyroid are just a few of the many options - and, their STD Test discreetly allows you to test for 7 types of STDs, all from the privacy of your own home. And for listeners of the show, Everlywell is offering a special discount of twenty percent off an at-home lab test at

https://www.everlywell.com/dixie  

Over one million people have trusted Everlywell with their at-home lab testing, so go to https://www.everlywell.com/dixie for twenty percent off your at-home lab test.

 

Helix: Ready for better sleep? Helix Sleep has a quiz that takes just two minutes to complete and matches your body type and sleep preferences to the perfect mattress for you. Helix was awarded the #1 best overall mattress pick of 2020 and by GQ and Wired Magazine. Just go to HelixSleep.com/Dixie, take their two-minute sleep quiz, and they’ll match you to a customized mattress that will give you the best sleep of your life. 

Special Offer: right now, Helix is offering up to $200 off all mattress orders AND two free pillows to listeners of the Bawdy Storytelling podcast. That’s HelixSleep.com/Dixie for up to 200 dollars off and two free pillows!

 

When’s the next Bawdy in San Francisco? We’re celebrating Folsom Street Fair - that most high of Holy Days for Kinksters - with the Bawdy Folsom Kinktacular. We’ve got VIP tables for 2 or 4, Reserved and General Admission Seating, icy cold cocktails with dirty names and a seat for your butt after all that carousing in the sun at the Fair. Buy tickets for the live performance, or you can watch from anywhere on the Livestream: Tickets at

https://BawdyKinktacular2022.eventbrite.com

 

Bawdy returns to Seattle on Saturday, October 15th: It’s been almost 3 years, and now we’ve got a new venue, we’ll have brand new storytellers (have you pitched me your story? I just landed 2 tellers for this show!) and we’re so excited about this joyful reunion with the best community anywhere. Tell your friends about Bawdy’s return to Seattle, learn more about the show and buy Tickets at

https://bit.ly/BawdySeattle2022

 

Wanna get Motorboated onstage at our next live Bawdy? Become an #ApplauseTiddies Sponsor! As a sponsor, you choose the bra, you’ll get a sneak peek at it onstage, and you’ll get Motorboated in it, plus you get to name my bewbs for that month (they are currently named RedBear and Michael, can you do better?). I have a Bra Registry at A Revelation in Fit in Oakland CA, so let’s do this thing, y’all! Contact BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com and let’s make a plan.

 

Patreon: If you love this podcast, you can thank Bawdy’s Patreon supporters - they made this happen! It’s because of people like you who support this important work that we do, people who want these stories wherever they are. Join our Patreon now and you get exclusive rewards when you join (like monthly free livestream tickets at the $10/mo level!) Become a member now at

https://www.patreon.com/Bawdy

 

Not a fan of the Patreon model? 

Want to support Bawdy in another way? 

Here are other ways to make donating easy:

 

Venmo: Venmo.com/BawdyStorytelling

Paypal: paypal.me/bawdystorytelling

Zelle: BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com

CashApp: $DixieDeLaTour

And THANK YOU!

 

Hire Me for Private Story Coaching: Storytelling for Self-Discovery can help you find, create and polish your own stories (this is my one-on-one private coaching option, and a recent client said ‘OMG, you just saved me 2 years of therapy, Dixie!’ Why? Because together, we do the work and find what that story is really about for you) Do you want learn to tell a compelling, relatable personal true story? I can help you dig deep, gain understanding and communicate with clarity. Writing a memoir, creating a podcast, or want to learn brand storytelling for your business or another story-related endeavor? Email me at BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com and let’s make it happen.

 

Bawdy Got Me Laid perfume, Bawdy Butter & more: Dixie has created her own fragrance: You’ll love #BawdyGotMeLaid perfume, scented with golden honey, amber, ylang ylang, and warm vanilla. There’s also our (scented or unscented) creamy Bawdy Butter, Hair & Bawdy Oil, & more. Bawdy Got Me Laid Merchandise means you can deliver your own great smelling Motorboats while supporting Dixie and Bawdy. Get yours today at https://bawdystorytelling.com/merchandise

 

Check out our Bawdy Storytelling Fiends and Fans group on Facebook - it’s a place to discuss the podcast’s stories with the storytellers, share thoughts with your fellow listeners, & help Dixie make the podcast even better. Just answer 3 simple questions and you’re IN! https://www.facebook.com/groups/360169851578316/

Quake is gone.

Quake was Sainted by the Sisters of Perpetual Indulgence this past week, so if you need some extra love or luck, you’ve got a Saint on your side! I am so proud and happy that this honor has been bestowed on him; It makes his death a tiny bit easier.

If you wanna help out with Quake’s End of Life/final Veterinary expenses, the GoFundMe is at 

https://bit.ly/QuakeTheSaint

He was the Love of my Life, and I’ll never get over this loss.

P.S. Thank you for loving Quake, too. <3

 

ProTip: Subscribe to the Bawdy Storytelling email list & you’ll be notified of all upcoming storytelling workshops, livestreams, podcasts, live shows and Special Events first at

https://bawdystorytelling.com/subscribe

 

Thank you to the Team that makes this podcast possible!

Team Bawdy is:

 

Podcast Producer: Roman Den houdijker Sound Engineer: David Grosof Archivist / Video: Joe Moore

Bawdy Livestream pre-show video by Donal Mooney

Live-streaming by Rubeun Tan

Storytelling support by Mosa Maxwell-Smith (!!!)

& Bawdy Creator & Podcast Host Dixie De La Tour

& Thank you to Pleasure Podcasts. Bawdy Storytelling is proud to be part of your sex-positive podcast collective! 

 

Tags:

 

pixie skilled lovers tall blonde big bold excited crew skin glow fireplace giggles playfulness attract me energy solid calm sit center bed meditatively kicks in time bends life starts to blur mental adventure body turned on connected crystal hot scene amazing connection community stan insecurity included clear you belong ever feel excluded holding space pleasure high school parties business partner creator motivation unique place potential orgies unique everything want threesome moresomes flogging everything escape jealousy belonging attractive left out high school friend room psychedelic sex positive luminaries experience of a lifetime kind loving Kermit the Frog Albert Einstein closest friends acid trip sex educator queers ecstatic dance DJs Marin Headlands San Francisco flogging fisting fucking Romi cross kind loving responsible innovator intentionally gathered shepherd acid-induced huge AirBnB Hot tub huge bathtub opening circle flip n fucks cushion filled lounge consent talk house logistics name dig deep open life centered expand new place fulfill my purpose passes out the acid kick in connection games soak hot tub scamper master bedroom fiery

 

Want more Bawdy? www.BawdyStorytelling.com Follow us on Twitter: @Bawdy On Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bawdystorytelling/ Like us at www.Facebook.com/BawdyStorytelling Join us on FetLife: https://fetlife.com/groups/46341 Support us on Patreon at https://www.patreon.com/Bawdy Watch us on YouTube at http://bit.ly/BawdyTV Find out about upcoming Podcast episodes - & Livestreams - at www.BawdyStorytelling.com/subscribe

Over one million people have trusted Everlywell with their at-home lab testing, so go to https://www.everlywell.com/dixie for twenty percent off your at-home lab test.

 

Helix: Ready for better sleep? Helix Sleep has a quiz that takes just two minutes to complete and matches your body type and sleep preferences to the perfect mattress for you. Helix was awarded the #1 best overall mattress pick of 2020 and by GQ and Wired Magazine. Just go to HelixSleep.com/Dixie, take their two-minute sleep quiz, and they’ll match you to a customized mattress that will give you the best sleep of your life. 

Special Offer: right now, Helix is offering up to $200 off all mattress orders AND two free pillows to listeners of the Bawdy Storytelling podcast. That’s HelixSleep.com/Dixie for up to 200 dollars off and two free pillows!

 

When’s the next Bawdy in San Francisco? We’re celebrating Folsom Street Fair - that most high of Holy Days for Kinksters - with the Bawdy Folsom Kinktacular. We’ve got VIP tables for 2 or 4, Reserved and General Admission Seating, icy cold cocktails with dirty names and a seat for your butt after all that carousing in the sun at the Fair. Buy tickets for the live performance, or you can watch from anywhere on the Livestream: Tickets at

https://BawdyKinktacular2022.eventbrite.com

 

Bawdy returns to Seattle on Saturday, October 15th: It’s been almost 3 years, and now we’ve got a new venue, we’ll have brand new storytellers (have you pitched me your story? I just landed 2 tellers for this show!) and we’re so excited about this joyful reunion with the best community anywhere. Tell your friends about Bawdy’s return to Seattle, learn more about the show and buy Tickets at

https://bit.ly/BawdySeattle2022

 

Wanna get Motorboated onstage at our next live Bawdy? Become an #ApplauseTiddies Sponsor! I have a Bra Registry at A Revelation in Fit in Oakland CA, so let’s do this thing, y’all! Contact BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com and let’s make a plan.

 

Patreon: If you love this podcast, you can thank Bawdy’s Patreon supporters - they made this happen! It’s because of people like you who support this important work that we do, people who want these stories wherever they are. Join our Patreon now and you get exclusive rewards when you join (like monthly free livestream tickets at the $10/mo level!) Become a member now at

https://www.patreon.com/Bawdy

 

Not a fan of the Patreon model? 

Want to support Bawdy in another way?

Venmo: Venmo.com/BawdyStorytelling

Zelle: BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com

Quake is gone.

https://bit.ly/QuakeTheSaint

item.content:encoded:
Can Sex Parties empower you to heal your lifelong insecurities? Bonobo Network co-producer Misha Bonaventura is invited to an intimate acid-induced birthday experience and as she looks around at the beautiful bodies at this drug-fueled orgy, she sets an intention; Does she want to make love to her friends and compatriots tonight, or does she want to make love to time, and to the meaning of life? As she dances and rejoices in the sights and the orgasms of the luminaries around her, she suddenly finds herself singled out by the cosmos - and everyone else notices it, too. #Insecure #Excluded #YouBelong

 

Song: ‘Disco Tits’ (Tove Lo)

About the Storyteller:

 

Misha Bonaventura co-produces the Bonobo Network - a  High Possibility, Low Expectation sex-positive community - alongside its founder, William Winters. She teaches and consults individuals and communities to develop their consent culture with a harm reduction and transformative justice lens. She is passionate about supporting sex positive community and helping people create more pleasure for themselves. 

Her private practice, Clearing Conversations, focuses on conflict resolution and communication coaching. Misha loves supporting the sex positive community of the Bay Area and beyond in creating sustainable, long-term relationship building.

 

Bonobo Network:https://www.bonobonetwork.com/

 

Clearing Conversations:

http://www.clearingconversations.com/

 

Episode links:

 

Everlywell: Everlywell at-home lab tests give you physician-reviewed results and personalized insights so you can take action on your health and wellness—all at an affordable and transparent cost. With over thirty tests, you’ll be able to choose the ones that make the most sense for you. Everlywell’s Food Sensitivity, Metabolism, Sleep & Stress, and Thyroid are just a few of the many options - and, their STD Test discreetly allows you to test for 7 types of STDs, all from the privacy of your own home. And for listeners of the show, Everlywell is offering a special discount of twenty percent off an at-home lab test at

https://www.everlywell.com/dixie  

Over one million people have trusted Everlywell with their at-home lab testing, so go to https://www.everlywell.com/dixie for twenty percent off your at-home lab test.

Special Offer: right now, Helix is offering up to $200 off all mattress orders AND two free pillows to listeners of the Bawdy Storytelling podcast. That’s HelixSleep.com/Dixie for up to 200 dollars off and two free pillows!

And THANK YOU!

 

Hire Me for Private Story Coaching: Storytelling for Self-Discovery can help you find, create and polish your own stories (this is my one-on-one private coaching option, and a recent client said ‘OMG, you just saved me 2 years of therapy, Dixie!’ Why? I can help you dig deep, gain understanding and communicate with clarity. Bawdy Got Me Laid perfume, Bawdy Butter & more: Dixie has created her own fragrance: You’ll love #BawdyGotMeLaid perfume, scented with golden honey, amber, ylang ylang, and warm vanilla.
