item.title: Episode 187 ’Party of Three’ (Nicholette Routhier)
item.itunes:title: ’Party of Three’ (Nicholette Routhier)
item.description:
Can your relationship become stronger with a third person in it? Unicorn and first time storyteller Nicholette Routhier blurts out the words “Do you ever invite third parties into your relationship for sexual or nonsexual intimacy?” to her Couple Crush, and her bravery is rewarded with some of the best - and most acrobatic - sex of all 3 of their lives. When it comes to triads, who really gets the sweet end of the lollipop; the couple or their guest star? #Queerness #NonMonogamous #OrgasmInStereo

 

This week’s storyteller: 

Nicholette Routhier is a teacher of embodiment and sexual yoga, a relationship coach, professional dancer, and acrobat currently living in Salt Lake City, Utah. www.nicholetterouthier.com

 

Song: ‘Stroker Ace’ (Lovage)

 

Episode Links

Uberlube: Your body benefits from lube, and Uberlube is the best! Uberlube offers you the clean, natural, long-lasting performance you want, then quickly dissipates without leaving a sticky residue. https://www.upworthy.com/kindness-to-homeless-man-florida-viral

item.description:
Can you be just a little big Pregnant? Is raw-dogging more fun? & can you change your own race by having a biracial baby?

Comedian Emily Epstein White discovers that the things people say to you when you’re knocked up can blow your mind so this week, we’re doling out sex ed & reproduction facts, tips & tricks to avoid racism, and even orgasmic birth. #Procreation #Lactation #LetsSayWereTrying #MixedRace

 

This week’s storyteller: 

New York- to-Oakland-to-Philly comedian and storyteller Emily Epstein White has been trapped in a self-cleaning toilet, has stitches from a treadmill accident, and once hung off the front of a truck like a hood ornament to avoid being run over. She performs all around Philadelphia, New York City, the Northeast, San Francisco and the Bay area, and the West Coast, (not to mention a boat in the middle of the Yangtze River in China). She has been featured on FreeSpeech TV, several times on The Q Show on Fox, and in many festivals and publications such as the 360 Comedy Festival, the She-Devil Comedy Festival, The Bechdel Test Fest, a semi-finalist twice at Helium Comedy Club's Philly Phunniest competition, the Boston Globe, and has won the San Francisco MothSlam.

Follow her ass @emeps on Twitter.

 

Song: ‘Dirty Little Secret’ (Jefferson Bergey)

Jefferson’s been writing custom songs for Bawdy for years! Learn more about him and his music at http://www.jeffersonbergey.com/

 

Episode Links

Feeld: Are you single and searching for a dating app that actually encourages you to embrace your sexual side? Are you in a couple and looking to find that third? Then, you need to check out Feeld. Feeld is the alternative dating app for couples & singles. 
The app is inclusive to all, no matter your gender or orientation. When you join, you can choose to identify as over 20+ genders and sexualities. The New York Times wrote that Feeld’s options “put the Kinsey scale to shame.” Here’s some great news: You can download the Feeld app for free AND support the Bawdy Storytelling podcast by using this link: 

https://feeld.app.link/Dixie50
Use our code/link to let them know you heard about em on the Bawdy podcast, & I’ll see you on Feeld!

 

Patreon: You can get free livestream tickets, get access to all the livestream replays, be connected to other Bawdy fans, join the #Buttplug Club and so much more. Sign up for The Hookup ($10/month) or higher cause members receive free tickets to special events, Free tickets to our Livestream shows, access to the livestream replay, ad-free episodes of the podcast & more. Our Patreon has new patron tiers like the Confidante, the Concierge & more. Our Patrons have kept Bawdy going during COVID and as we struggle with re-entry, we’re saying Thank you to all of you with Insider Info and exclusive access. While other events have gone away, Patreon (and you) are allowing us to continue to produce the Bawdy podcast, livestreams and live shows. We’re offering great rewards when you become a member of our Patreon, so become a Member Now at https://www.patreon.com/Bawdy

 

Support Bawdy by sending your one-time donation to:

Venmo: Venmo.com/BawdyStorytelling

Paypal: BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com

Zelle: BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com

(& Thank You in advance!)

Cameo/Custom Dixie video: Need the perfect gift? I’ve been having so much fun making customized videos for your! Send your friends and lovers a custom ‘Cameo’ video from Dixie (with or without applause tiddies), it’s a great way to send love from far away to a Bawdy fan… For just $69, you and I can have a short zoom call, you can tell me all about the recipient, and I’ll make a custom video from you for their special day. Find out more by emailing dixie@BawdyStorytelling.com #CustomVideo #Gift

 

Bawdy Got Me Laid: Bawdy Storytelling offers its own line of fragrance & lube for your favorite podcast or scent fan! You’ll love #BawdyGotMeLaid perfume, scented with golden honey, amber, ylang ylang and warm vanilla. There’s also (scented or unscented) creamy Bawdy Butter, Hair & Bawdy Oil, lube & more. Bawdy Merchandise means you smell great while supporting a podcast that you love.

Get yours today at https://bawdystorytelling.com/merchandise

 

Ready to tell your story, and change your life? I’m offering Storytelling for Self-Discovery. Anxious about navigating what’s next? Are you writing a book, or working on your Business’ brand storytelling?  No matter what you’re up against, I can help you communicate with calmness & clarity - and I’d love to help you find your story. Email me at dixie@BawdyStorytelling.com for more info - we can book a short discovery call, I’m happy to answer any questions.

 

Check out our Bawdy Storytelling Fiends and Fans group on Facebook - it’s a place to discuss the podcast’s stories with the storytellers, share thoughts with your fellow listeners, & help Dixie make the podcast even better. Just answer 3 simple questions and you’re IN! https://www.facebook.com/groups/360169851578316/

Subscribe to our email list & you’ll be notified of all upcoming Livestreams, Podcasts and Special Events first - it’s at 

https://bawdystorytelling.com/subscribe

 

Thank you to the Team that makes this podcast possible

 

Team Bawdy is:
Podcast Producer & Livestream Technical Director: Marty Garcia and Bearded Scotsman Audio
Sound Engineer: David Grosof
Archivist / Video: Joe Moore

Bawdy Livestream pre-show video by Donal Mooney

Storytelling support by Mosa Maxwell-Smith

Livestreaming by Rubeun Tan Web Streaming

& Bawdy Creator & Podcast Host Dixie De La Tour

& Thank you to Pleasure Podcasts. Bawdy Storytelling is proud to be part of your sex-positive podcast collective!

item.title: Episode 185 ’C*ck Connoisseur’ (mr. Pam)
item.itunes:title: ’C*ck Connoisseur’ (mr. Pam)
item.description:
How many dicks do you see in a day? Award-winning gay porn producer mr. Pam sees ‘em in her email, in bars, on Facebook chat…honestly, this woman knows a LOT about cock. Wanna learn some porn producer tips & tricks, including how to get those hot guys to stop by for sex - with you! - on their way out of town? Final question: If everybody can do something that they think they don’t wanna do for 4 minutes, why have we been fucking for hours?! #AccidentalFluffer #FullMast #IMadeThatDick #SundayAndSober #PopShotFantasy #DicksAndDollarBills

 

This week’s storyteller: 

mr. Pam is a proud, passionate and multi-award-winning gay porn director, videographer, photographer and producer who recently made the leap and started her own production company Wham Bam Pictures, specializing in filming everything from big budget films, BDSM, custom fan content and most recently - merchandise featuring her gay erotic photography. Follow mr. Pam at https://www.instagram.com/mrpam/

 

Song: ‘Harder you get’ (Scissor Sisters)

 

Episode Links

Right now, They’re offering Bawdy Storytelling listeners a special offer: 10% off and FREE shipping, when you use the code Dixie at uberlube.com  #SupportThePodcast #LubeRocks

Whether you want a story to turn you on or to wind you down for better sleep, Dipsea has wellness sessions, bedtime stories and soundscapes to help you relax. Dipsea helps you get in touch with yourself for some extra sweet dreams.

item.title: Episode 184 ’Shitkicker’ (Wonder Dave)
item.itunes:title: ’Shitkicker’ (Wonder Dave)
item.description:
Are you attracted to men who look like they might choke you in their Semi? Comedian and writer Wonder Dave is tired of long distance hookups, so when he discovers that an enamored and musclebound jock lives just 2 blocks from him, Dave is definitely DTF. But things take an unexpected turn when this ripped stranger makes a special request - and suddenly, they’re not alone. #GayBar #WalkOfShame #InternalMonologue #LeaveYourShoesOn #RoadSoda #Dismount

 

Our Storyteller this week:

Wonder Dave is the co-creator of the Mental Health Comedy Hour, a show where comedians tell jokes and talk about mental health, and is a pro wrestling commentator for Hoodslam’s Sexy Good Time Wrestle Show. You can frequently catch him on the comedy podcast Nerd Rage The Great Debates, and find him online at WonderDave.org  

 

Song: ‘These boots are made for walking’ (Nancy Sinatra)

 

Episode Links

Helix: Ready for better sleep? Helix Sleep has a quiz that takes just two minutes to complete and matches your body type and sleep preferences to the perfect mattress for you. Helix was awarded the #1 best overall mattress pick of 2020 and by GQ and Wired Magazine.

Just go to HelixSleep.com/Dixie, take their two-minute sleep quiz, and they’ll match you to a customized mattress that will give you the best sleep of your life. 

Special Offer: right now, Helix is offering up to $200 off all mattress orders AND two free pillows to listeners of the Bawdy Storytelling podcast. That’s HelixSleep.com/Dixie for up to 200 dollars off and two free pillows!

Unable to voice her own desires and not ready for love or commitment, she hires a ‘spotter’ in the form of Marty, one of the only sexological bodyworkers in puritan New England. Can receiving pleasure be silly and playful? More importantly, will these expensive training sessions ever change from awkward to orgasmic?

item.itunes:title: ’Kinky Conspiracy’ (Kate Sloan)
item.description:
Can you feel the cold, wet squeak? When Girly Juice blogger, Dildorks podcaster, and kink author Kate Sloan sparks the attention of the gorgeous Matthew on Twitter, she can barely make eye contact with them. Soon this gorgeous suitor inundates our favorite bisexual submissive with gifts, long distance flights, spot-on role-play & ego-bolstering rope scenes - yet somehow, Matthew’s exquisite spankings leave her self-conscious and paranoid, rather than euphoric. This Secret Sex Spy seems a bit too ideally perverted and weird for her; what if it’s a trick? Or worse yet, what if it’s not? #Espionage #GoodGirl #Suspicious#OutOfMyLeague

 

Song: ‘Spy in the House of Love’ (Was/Not Was)

 

Episode Links

item.title: Episode 181 ’Cornography’ (Jimmy Sorrentino)
item.itunes:title: ’Cornography’ (Jimmy Sorrentino)
item.description:
Kids these days have it so easy. We live in a world where, with your phone and a ring light, you can start your burgeoning porn empire. Back in my day, I had to walk uphill 3 miles in the snow to take a picture of my cooch. Seattle based comedian Jimmy Sorrentino knows what I'm talking about. In this episode, a 71-year old Jimmy (just kidding) lugs state of the art camera equipment and a willing punk rock goth pixie dream girl to the middle of a cornfield to create some pictures to remember. But a first generation digital camera is the least of their worries, and much like Jimmy's corn field, we're all ears. #Condoms #FloppyDisks #HomemadePorn

 

Song: ‘Lovers in the Backseat’ (Scissor Sisters)

 

Episode Links

Live Shows are Back! : Our last live/ Livestream Bawdy event was a massive, Sold Out Success - and we only have this gorgeous outdoor Courtyard for two more dates. Get tickets now for Bawdy’s Saturday July 17th, 2021 show in San Francisco - Tickets are going fast!

Tickets (for Front Row Tables, Reserved Seating, General Admission & more) are at http://bit.ly/BawdyJulyOutdoorSF

Not in San Francisco? This is a Hybrid show, so buy a ticket for the Livestream, too. Be sure to RSVP and share it with friends!

On Facebook:  https://fb.me/e/ULb82P94

On Fetlife: https://fetlife.com/events/1007389

 

Questions? Email BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com

 

Uberlube: Your body benefits from Lube - and Uberlube is the best! Uberlube offers you the clean, natural, long-lasting performance you want, then quickly dissipates without leaving a sticky residue. Right now, They’re offering Bawdy Storytelling listeners a special offer: 10% off and FREE shipping, when you use the code Dixie at uberlube.com  #SupportOurSponsors #LubeRocks

 

Patreon: Wanna watch the Livestream replay of this past weekend’s first Live Bawdy in San Francisco? Want free Livestream tickets for our next Live/Hybrid show? You get BOTH when you become a member of our Patreon at the Hookup ($10/month) level or greater. Bawdy’s Patreon supporters receive free tickets to special events, Free tickets to our Livestream shows, access to the livestream replay, ad-free episodes of the podcast, you’ll be connected to other Bawdy fans, you can join the #ButtplugClub and so much more. Our Patreon has patron tiers like the Confidante, the Concierge & more. While other events have gone away out, Patreon (and you) are allowing us to continue to produce the podcast & livestreams - and to make Bawdy even better as we relaunch. Become a Member Now at https://www.patreon.com/Bawdy

 

Support Bawdy by sending your one-time donation to:

Venmo: Venmo.com/BawdyStorytelling

Paypal: BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com

Zelle: BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com

(& Thank You in advance!)

Cameo/Custom Dixie video: Need the perfect gift? I’ve been having so much fun making customized videos for fans of Bawdy. Send your friends and lovers a custom ‘Cameo’ video from Dixie (with or without applause tiddies), it’s a great way to send love for a quarantine birthday, for Mother’s Day… For $69, you and I can have a short zoom call to tell me all about the recipient, and I’ll make you a custom video for their special day. Find out more by emailing dixie@BawdyStorytelling.com #CustomVideo #Gift

 

Bawdy Got Me Laid: Bawdy Storytelling offers its own line of fragrance & lube for your favorite podcast or scent fan! You’ll love #BawdyGotMeLaid perfume, scented with golden honey, amber, ylang ylang and warm vanilla. There’s also (scented or unscented) creamy Bawdy Butter, Hair & Bawdy Oil, lube & more. Bawdy Merchandise means you smell great while supporting a podcast that you love.

Get yours today at https://bawdystorytelling.com/merchandise

 

Ready to tell your story, and change your life? I’m offering Storytelling for Self-Discovery, and I’d love to help you find your story. Anxious about navigating what’s next? Are you writing a book, or working on your Business’ brand storytelling?  No matter what you’re up against, I can help you communicate with calmness & clarity.

Email me at dixie@BawdyStorytelling.com for more info - we can book a short discovery call, I’m happy to answer any questions.

 

Check out our Bawdy Storytelling Fiends and Fans group on Facebook - it’s a place to discuss the podcast’s stories with the storytellers, share thoughts with your fellow listeners, & help Dixie make the podcast even better. Just answer 3 simple questions and you’re IN! https://www.facebook.com/groups/360169851578316/

Subscribe to our email list & you’ll be notified of all upcoming Livestreams, Podcasts and Special Events first - it’s at 

https://bawdystorytelling.com/subscribe

 

Thank you to the Team that makes this podcast possible

 

Team Bawdy is:
Podcast Producer & Livestream Technical Director: Marty Garcia
Sound Engineer: David Grosof
Archivist / Video: Joe Moore

Bawdy Livestream pre-show video by Donal Mooney

Storytelling support by Mosa Maxwell-Smith

Livestreaming by Rubeun Tan Web Streaming

& Bawdy Creator & Podcast Host Dixie De La Tour

& Thank you to Pleasure Podcasts. Bawdy Storytelling is proud to be part of your sex-positive podcast collective! 

 

Want more Bawdy?
www.BawdyStorytelling.com
Follow us on Twitter: @Bawdy
On Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bawdystorytelling/
Like us at www.Facebook.com/BawdyStorytelling
Join us on FetLife: https://fetlife.com/groups/46341
Support us on Patreon at https://www.patreon.com/Bawdy
Watch us on YouTube at http://bit.ly/BawdyTV
Find out about upcoming Podcast episodes - & Livestreams - at www.BawdyStorytelling.com/subscribe

item.title: Episode 180 ’Gender Gratification’ (Archie Bongiovanni)
item.itunes:title: ’Gender Gratification’ (Archie Bongiovanni)
item.description:
Getting naked can mean an unhindered flow of sexual energy between you and a partner, but what if you’re only comfortable if you cover up? Cartoonist Archie Bongiovanni discovered the term Genderqueer years ago, and finally, a beyond-the-binary signifier that fits their gender identity! That first dingy homemade binder made them feel better in their skin, but the responses to it from their hookups didn’t - until Archie meets Jock and Triple Leo Andy, and suddenly the binders are flying, and skin-on-skin feels oh so right. #QueerYourLimits #Trans #Negotiation #ItsABop

 

See Archie’s art at

https://www.archiebongiovanni.com/

Archie’s Books, Merch & more at

https://linktr.ee/archiebongiovanni

 

Song: ‘These Shoes’ (Skyler Bennett)

Thank you, Skyler!

 

Episode Links

Event: Our First Outdoor, Fully Vaccinated Post Pandemic Bawdy was a Sold out Success!  The next live Bawdy Storytelling is happening on Saturday July 17th, 2021 (8-10 PM) in San Francisco. Helix: Ready for better sleep? Helix Sleep has a quiz that takes just two minutes to complete and matches your body type and sleep preferences to the perfect mattress for you. Helix was awarded the #1 best overall mattress pick of 2020 and by GQ and Wired Magazine.

Just go to HelixSleep.com/Dixie, take their two-minute sleep quiz, and they’ll match you to a customized mattress that will give you the best sleep of your life. 

Special Offer: right now, Helix is offering up to $200 off all mattress orders AND two free pillows to listeners of the Bawdy Storytelling podcast. That’s HelixSleep.com/Dixie for up to 200 dollars off and two free pillows!

 

Feeld: Are you single and searching for a dating app that actually encourages you to embrace your sexual side? Are you in a couple and looking to find that third? Then, you need to check out Feeld. Feeld is the alternative dating app for couples & singles. 
The app is inclusive to all, no matter your gender or orientation. When you join, you can choose to identify as over 20+ genders and sexualities. The New York Times wrote that Feeld’s options “put the Kinsey scale to shame.” Here’s some great news: You can download the Feeld app for free AND support the Bawdy Storytelling podcast by using this link: https://feeld.app.link/Dixie50
Use our code/link to let them know you heard about em on the Bawdy podcast, & I’ll see you on Feeld!

We’re offering great rewards when you become a member of our Patreon. (& Thank You in advance!)

item.title: Episode 179 ’Dry Rub’ (Jonathan Euseppi)
item.itunes:title: ’Dry Rub’ (Jonathan Euseppi)
item.description:
“You have Cancer. And now you have to come!” Stand-up Comedian & Improviser Jonathan Euseppi learns 2 things from his doctor: 1. He has round cell liposarcoma, and 2. Chemo will make him infertile, so they must collect a viable specimen right away. Still reeling from his medical diagnosis, Jonathan visits the fertility clinic the next morning and is thrown one curveball after another - but the stakes have never been higher, so clear a path, here he comes. #Masturbation #DirtyTalk #HospitalTitties

 

Song: ‘Make my own Sunshine’ (Alyssa Bonagura)

item.content:encoded:
“You have Cancer. And now you have to come!” Stand-up Comedian & Improviser Jonathan Euseppi learns 2 things from his doctor: 1. He has round cell liposarcoma, and 2. Chemo will make him infertile, so they must collect a viable specimen right away. Still reeling from his medical diagnosis, Jonathan visits the fertility clinic the next morning and is thrown one curveball after another - but the stakes have never been higher, so clear a path, here he comes. #Masturbation #DirtyTalk #HospitalTitties

 

Song: ‘Make my own Sunshine’ (Alyssa Bonagura)

 

Episode Links

THIS WEEK: Live shows are back! Our First Outdoor, Fully Vaccinated Post Pandemic Bawdy is happening this Saturday June 19th, 2021 (8-10 PM) in San Francisco. It’s almost sold out, but there’s plenty of Livestream tickets available for our brand new Hybrid show.

Dipsea: Dipsea is an audio app full of short, sexy stories designed to turn you on. Whether you want a story to turn you on or to wind you down for better sleep, Dipsea has wellness sessions, bedtime stories and soundscapes to help you relax. Dipsea helps you get in touch with yourself for some extra sweet dreams.  And for listeners of the Bawdy Storytelling podcast, Dipsea is offering a 30 day free trial when you go to https://www.dipseastories.com/ and use the promo code DIXIE.  Dipsea release new stories every week, so there’s always more to explore - no matter who you’re into or what turns you on.  Download the app right now, and get a 30 day free trial when you go to https://www.dipseastories.com/Dixie

 

Uberlube: Your body benefits from Lube - and Uberlube is the best! Uberlube offers you the clean, natural, long-lasting performance you want, then quickly dissipates without leaving a sticky residue. Right now, They’re offering Bawdy Storytelling listeners a special offer: 10% off and FREE shipping, when you use the code Dixie at uberlube.com  #SupportOurSponsors #LubeRocks

 

Patreon: We’re offering great rewards when you become a member of our Patreon. You can get free tickets to our first livestream LIVE show, be connected to other Bawdy fans, join the #BPC and so much more. Our Patreon have new patron tiers like the Confidante, the Concierge & more. Our Hookup ($10/month) & up supporters receive free tickets to special events, Free tickets to our Livestream shows, access to the livestream replay, ad-free episodes of the podcast & more. Our Patrons have kept Bawdy going during COVID and we’re saying Thank you with Insider Info and exclusive access. A global pandemic, quarantine and economic devastation all at the same time? While other events have gone away out, Patreon (and you) are allowing us to continue to produce the podcast & livestreams - and to make Bawdy even better as we relaunch. Become a Member Now at https://www.patreon.com/Bawdy

Paypal: BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com

Zelle: BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com

(& Thank You in advance!)

item.itunes:title: ’Bible Induced Boner’ (Anna Pulley)
item.description:
Do you get turned on when you read aloud from Corinthians? Sex and dating columnist Anna Pulley takes us back to her broken-hearted teenager days, when a wise friend tells her ‘If you wanna get over someone, you have to get under someone’. Intent to turn over a new, sluttier leaf, Anna chooses born-again christian Will to have first time sex with, but she’s confused: is that erection for God, or for her? #Religious #Virginity #LikeAPrayer #Spirituality

 

Watch Anna Pulley tell her story on the Bawdy stage at

http://bit.ly/BawdyAnnaPulley

 

Song: ‘Sinning with You’ (Sam Hunt)

 

Episode Links

Get Tickets to our First Fully Vaccinated Post Pandemic San Francisco show on Saturday June 19th, 2021 (8-10 PM) at

http://bit.ly/BawdyLIVE2021
Livestream tickets now available!

Questions? Email BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com

Be sure to RSVP:
On Facebook: https://fb.me/e/14s0yP0Vr

On Fetlife: https://fetlife.com/events/997026

 

Feeld: Are you single and searching for a dating app that actually encourages you to embrace your sexual side? Are you in a couple and looking to find that third? Then, you need to check out Feeld. Feeld is the alternative dating app for couples & singles. 
The app is inclusive to all, no matter your gender or orientation. When you join, you can choose to identify as over 20+ genders and sexualities. The New York Times wrote that Feeld’s options “put the Kinsey scale to shame.” Here’s some great news: You can download the Feeld app for free AND support the Bawdy Storytelling podcast  by using this link: https://feeld.app.link/Dixie50
Use our code/link to let them know you heard about em on the Bawdy podcast, & I’ll see you on Feeld!

Can you die of a broken heart? Sex worker and Doctor-to-be Ryan Reid is interviewed by his residency advisor about what inspires his passion for medicine, and he rashly decides to tell them the truth. This is the story of Paul, an outcall client who paid him a fat wad of cash one balmy July afternoon & whose life intersected Ryan’s journey as a medical researcher and prostitute. item.itunes:title: ’Cuck Inc.’ (Marcia B)
item.description:
“Mistress, we’re already in Quarantine; must we add orgasm denial, too?!” Marcia B’s non-binary partner Cami loves chastity play and humiliation, and Marcia soon realizes how compatible their kinks are - power exchange and cock cages work well together. But when Marcia’s Chastity cards determine that Cami’s cock will be locked up for over 100 days, she creates a sadistic zoom board meeting and enlists her meanest femme domme friends to determine Cami’s fate. Will Cami the Submissive be able to earn their way out of Chastity? #Psychological #Gamify #NoPants #EarnIt

 

Song: ‘Locked Out of Heaven’ (Bruno Mars)

 

About this storyteller: Marcia B is an internationally-recognized speaker, writer, coach and expert on sexual communication, relationships and women’s empowerment. Her primary mission is to help women and the people who love them to overcome shame and get in touch with what they truly want – romantically, sexually and relationally – even if it’s off the beaten path. You can find her online at www.AskingForWhatYouWant.com.

 

Wanna see Marcia’s Chastity Play cards? I’ll be posting the image (and tell you the backstory on how they came to be) at https://www.patreon.com/Bawdy #BecomeAMember

 

Episode Links

Our next Bawdy Livestream will be this Saturday, May 15th at 7 PM PST. This time, it’s Dixie’s birthday, and we’re celebrating with stories from Best of Bawdy’s Mollena Williams-Haas, porn producer Mr. Pam, songs by the brilliant Shirley Gnome & much more. Bawdy’s live shows bring you phenomenal #stories #community & #connection #DanceParty #Prizes and more. 

Get your Livestream tickets at
http://bit.ly/BawdyLibertineLS
On Facebook: https://fb.me/e/2eLIeBhU3

On Fetlife: https://fetlife.com/events/993554

 

Feeld:  Are you single and searching for a dating app that actually encourages you to embrace your sexual side? Are you in a couple and looking to find that third? Then, you need to check out Feeld. Feeld is the alternative dating app for couples & singles. 
The app is inclusive to all, no matter your gender or orientation. When you join, you can choose to identify as over 20+ genders and sexualities. The New York Times wrote that Feeld’s options “put the Kinsey scale to shame.” Here’s some great news: You can download the Feeld app for free AND support the Bawdy Storytelling podcast  by using this link: https://feeld.app.link/Dixie50
You’ll get 50% off the first three months of Feeld’s Majestic membership, which gives you access to premium features (like seeing who’s liked you!) so use our code/link & I’ll see you on Feeld!

 

Ready for Reentry: Feeling scared & tentative about opening back up to love & socializing? Join me for Ready for Reentry: Easing back into Sex, Dating and Hooking up.

WHY not have a plan so that you can rock reentry? Take the guesswork out of re-entering social life. Know what you need and how to ask for it. Please join my friend sex and relationship educator, Reid Mihalko of ReidAboutSex.com, (and a bunch of his favorite guest educators) for 6-weeks of guidance, laughter, and shame-free figuring out what your Reentry Game Plan is going to be. 

Sign up now at http://tinyurl.com/ready4reentry

& use promo code BAWDY ticket for $21 off the price of any ticket - but the class starts this Monday, May 17th so do it NOW.

Our Hookup ($10/month) & up supporters receive free tickets to special events, Free tickets to our Livestream shows, access to the livestream replay, ad-free episodes of the podcast & more. “Mistress, we’re already in Quarantine; must we add orgasm denial, too?!” Marcia B’s non-binary partner Cami loves chastity play and humiliation, and Marcia soon realizes how compatible their kinks are - power exchange and cock cages work well together. But when Marcia’s Chastity cards determine that Cami’s cock will be locked up for over 100 days, she creates a sadistic zoom board meeting and enlists her meanest femme domme friends to determine Cami’s fate. Will Cami the Submissive be able to earn their way out of Chastity? #Psychological #Gamify #NoPants #EarnIt

 

Song: ‘Locked Out of Heaven’ (Bruno Mars)

 

About this storyteller: Marcia B is an internationally-recognized speaker, writer, coach and expert on sexual communication, relationships and women’s empowerment. Her primary mission is to help women and the people who love them to overcome shame and get in touch with what they truly want – romantically, sexually and relationally – even if it’s off the beaten path. Have you ever been cockblocked by that crinkle of shame in your crotch-ial region? First time storyteller Katie Jayne has always been queer, but when she finds our her partner has been cheating she decides to do some research and what all the straight guy fuss is about. Never one to half-ass anything, Katie takes on 16 guys in 6 weeks to deal with her anger and resentment - and she ends up with new self-knowledge (and some surprising results).

item.description:
Does your Spanish sex hotel have special furniture for shaggin’? In this sex & travel-centric episode, comedian David Nolan falls for an exotic beauty who’s way out of his league - a Ferrari, when he’s used to a Ford Fiesta. What begins with an English lesson for a Columbian actress results in a rather unusual Thank You gift - but can his faint Irish heart keep up with all the intrigue, espionage, and adventurous group sex? Plus Bawdy’s own musical sidekick Jefferson Bergey is singing about doin’ it on public transit. Get ready to lube that Transbay tube! #NoRegrets #Cartagena #Dublin #HyperLocal

item.itunes:title: ’Topped by Science’ (Jaclyn Friedman)
item.description:
Do you require scientific validation of your desire? Author, Speaker, Podcaster and Consent Advocate Jaclyn Friedman wants to study her orgasm, but she’s getting first date jitters. What is sexual concordance, and why is it so difficult for this overachiever to get it up when someone is studying their sex data? Plus Bawdy’s musical muse, Rachel Lark, performs a song she wrote especially for our Nerdgasm show. Lube up, cause knowledge has never been so arousing! #OrgasmDenial #IcebergClit #Fencesitter

Hosted by Sexual Folklorist Dixie De La Tour

Opening Music: 8 Miles Wide by Storm Large

About the storyteller:

 

Jaclyn Friedman is a writer, educator and activist, and creator of four books Yes Means Yes: Visions of Female Sexual Power and a World Without Rape (which was one of Publishers’ Weekly’s Top 100 Books of 2009), What You Really Really Want: The Smart Girl’s Shame-Free Guide to Sex & Safety, Unscrewed: Women, Sex, Power and How to Stop Letting the System Screw Us All, and her latest, Believe Me: How Trusting Women Can Change the World. 

Her podcast, also called Unscrewed, is paving new paths to sexual liberation, and was named one of the Best Sex Podcasts by both Marie Claire and Esquire. Learn more at https://www.jaclynfriedman.com/

Song: ‘Flowers Fuck’ (Rachel Lark)

Learn more about her work at https://www.rachellark.com/

Become a member of Lark’s Patreon at 

https://www.patreon.com/rachellark

Whether you want a story to turn you on or to wind you down for better sleep, Dipsea helps you get in touch with yourself for some extra sweet dreams. 
And for listeners of the Bawdy Storytelling podcast, Dipsea is offering a 30 day free trial when you go to https://www.dipseastories.com/ and use the promo code DIXIE.  Dipsea release new stories every week, so there’s always more to explore - no matter who you’re into or what turns you on.  Download the app right now, and get a 30 day free trial when you go to https://www.dipseastories.com/Dixie

item.description:
Ping! Did you type ‘I’m cummming’ with 17 0’s and 1’s? Queer butch writer Sinclair Sexsmith tells a nostalgic tale of growing up horny and isolated in Alaska - until they discover sex and kink (and one-handed typing) on the internet. A telnet chatroom and a long distance flight lead Sinclair to the IRL sexual experience they’ve been craving for so long … but is this handsome stranger who they appear to be? #DialUp #Nerdgasm #Mixtape

 

SINCLAIR SEXSMITH (they/them) is a queer butch writer focusing on sexualities, genders, kink, and relationships. Their short story collection, Sweet & Rough: Queer Kink Erotica, was a 2016 finalist for a Lambda Literary Award, and they are the current editor of the Best Lesbian Erotica series. Find more of their work at sugarbutch.net. 

 

And Sinclair’s D/s Playground is four units of sexy experiments to take your dominance or submission to the next level.

D/s Playground doesn’t teach you how to be a dominant or a submissive, but rather offers tools, resources, texts, and experiments to explore your own relationship to dominance, submission, and authority exchange, so you can articulate your interests and explore your edges. After these explorations you will be better able to communicate what you’re looking for and desire — which greatly increases your chances of having it!

https://dsplayground.com/come-play/

Hosted by Sexual Folklorist Dixie De La Tour

Opening Music: 8 Miles Wide by Storm Large

item.description:
Are you ready for ThorCock at Burning Man on 30 hits of Acid? Nomadic writer Lacyeloo Winkelpleck thinks that this annual arts event in the Nevada desert is the sexiest place on Earth - & finally, she’s solo and free to be wildly inappropriate, and the playa gives her the microphone and stage she needs to express herself. So when a game of drug-fueled ‘Pick a Sparkle’ leads her to tall Viking-like Thor, together they climb dangerous oil derricks and wrestle and grind on beds while hundreds watch. After such an night, wouldn’t it be rude not to sample the d*ck? #Ineffable #Yoner #TripperMath #LetGo

Hosted by Sexual Folklorist Dixie De La Tour

Opening Music: 8 Miles Wide by Storm Large

item.description:
Ever tried to give someone an orgasm while hiding from the religious police? Saudi Arabian techie (and sex nerd) Abzi Faisal meets South African beauty Cathy at an illegal desert party, where they dance, drink bootleg hooch and cuddle in his tent. But when they decide to have a ‘real date’ back in the city, Abzi and Cathy have to navigate tattletale neighbors, police raids, & the accompanying threats of 80 lashes, deportation & jail time. Will that c*ck be worth all this intrigue and danger? #Polyamorous #Queer #BigLick #ComeHither

Helix: Ready for better sleep? Helix Sleep has a quiz that takes just two minutes to complete and matches your body type and sleep preferences to the perfect mattress for you. Why would you buy a mattress that’s made for someone else? With Helix, you’re getting a mattress that you know will be perfect for the way YOU sleep.  Everybody’s unique and Helix knows that, so they have several different mattress models to choose from. They have soft, medium, and firm mattresses, mattresses great for cooling you down if you sleep hot, and even a Helix Plus mattress for plus-size sleepers!!! (I think that’s brilliant). 

Helix was awarded the #1 best overall mattress pick of 2020 and by GQ and Wired Magazine.

Just go to HelixSleep.com/Dixie, take their two-minute sleep quiz, and they’ll match you to a customized mattress that will give you the best sleep of your life. 

They have a 10 year warranty and you get to try it out for a hundred nights, risk free. They’ll even pick it up for you if you don’t love it - but you will.The mattress comes right to your door shipped for free. You don’t ever need to go to a mattress store again.

Special Offer: right now, Helix is offering up to $200 off all mattress orders AND two free pillows to listeners of the Bawdy Storytelling podcast. That’s HelixSleep.com/Dixie for up to 200 dollars off and two free pillows!

 

CAMEO: Need the perfect gift? Send your friends and lovers a custom ‘Cameo’ video from Dixie (with or without applause tiddies). For $69, you can have a short zoom call with Dixie to tell her all about the recipient, and she’ll make you a custom video for them, in time for their special day. Find out more by emailing dixie@BawdyStorytelling.com #CustomVideo #Gift

 

Bawdy Got Me Laid: Bawdy Storytelling offers its own line of fragrance & lube for your favorite podcast or scent fan! You’ll love #BawdyGotMeLaid perfume, scented with golden honey, amber, ylang ylang and warm vanilla. There’s also (scented or unscented) creamy Bawdy Butter, Hair & Bawdy Oil, lube & more. Bawdy Merchandise means you smell great while supporting a podcast that you love.

Get yours today at https://bawdystorytelling.com/merchandise

 

Ready to tell your story, and change your life? I’m offering Storytelling for Self-Discovery, and I’d love to help you find your story. Anxious about navigating what’s next? Are you writing a book, or working on your Business’ brand storytelling?  No matter what you’re up against, I can help you communicate with calmness & clarity.

Email me at dixie@BawdyStorytelling.com for more info - we can book a short discovery call, I’m happy to answer any questions.

 

Check out our Bawdy Storytelling Fiends and Fans group on Facebook - it’s a place to discuss the podcast’s stories with the storytellers, share thoughts with your fellow listeners, & help Dixie make the podcast even better. Just answer 3 simple questions and you’re IN! https://www.facebook.com/groups/360169851578316/

Subscribe to our email list & you’ll be notified of all upcoming Livestreams, Podcasts and Special Events first - it’s at 

https://bawdystorytelling.com/subscribe

 

Thank you to the Team that makes this podcast possible

 

Team Bawdy is:
Podcast Producer & Livestream Technical Director: Marty Garcia
Sound Engineer: David Grosof
Archivist / Video: Joe Moore

Bawdy Livestream pre-show video by Donal Mooney

Storytelling support by Mosa Maxwell-Smith

& Bawdy Creator & Podcast Host Dixie De La Tour

& Thank you to Pleasure Podcasts. Bawdy Storytelling is proud to be part of your sex-positive podcast collective!

item.description:
Are you all wet and exhausted from Amy's sex swamp? Lavender menace Amy Melin is nicknamed after a famous Las Vegas landmark, but it comes with a bit of chagrin: yes, her orgasms are especially cinematic, but what about all that clean-up?! So when her friend Layla has a birthday, group leader the Queen of Mean pull out all the stops: fancy meal prep in a tiny kitchen, too many nude servers, spankings, a violet wand, the happy duck - and since it’s a special occasion, Amy is dessert. Wait, you want me to put that ice cold trailer hitch WHERE?#Drowning #AestheticallyDriven #HusButch #Aflac 

 

Song: ‘I Get Off’ (Halestorm)

Hosted by Sexual Folklorist Dixie De La Tour

item.itunes:title: ’A for Academic’ (Jeanette Clarke)
item.description:
Do you wanna watch me cry in the shower after we have sex? In this vintage story from the Bawdy archives, sex-positive parent Jeanette Clarke returns to school to get her Masters in Sexuality - and her first assignment? To keep a 7 day sex diary, documenting her every tryst, fantasy & sexual interaction. Can this highly competitive student impress the famous instructor - and nail that top grade - by hiring a babysitter and trying to do it all in just one night? #SocialJustice #Fieldwork #PublicSex

item.title: Episode 162 ’Friendly Neighborhood Dom’ (William Winters)
item.itunes:title: ’Friendly Neighborhood Dom’ (William Winters)
item.description:
Did you just throw a bag of dicks at my head?! Polyamorous sex party organizer William Winters takes an erotic humiliation workshop, musing that it’s a great way to add intensity to a kink scene. But when play partner Jana begs him to use these new psychological torture skills on her, he learns that being mean is harder than he thought, and aftercare isn’t just for the submissive. Talk about intense! #Blush #Shudder #Worthless #Unlovable

 

Song: ‘Hate on Me’ (Jill Scott)

 

Episode Links

Livestream: Our next show happens on Saturday, March 13th and   ‘Happy Accidents’ features Margaret Cho, Tracy Clark-Flory, music by Jefferson Bergey & more!  Buy your tickets NOW at https://bit.ly/BawdyHALS

 

Need the perfect gift? Send your friends and lovers a custom ‘Cameo’ video from Dixie (with or without applause tiddies). For $69, you can have a short zoom call with Dixie to tell her all about the recipient, and she’ll make you a custom video in time for their special day. Find out more by emailing dixie@BawdyStorytelling.com #CustomVideo #Gift

 

Bawdy Got Me Laid: Bawdy Storytelling offers its own line of fragrance & lube for your favorite podcast or scent fan! You’ll love #BawdyGotMeLaid perfume, scented with golden honey, amber, ylang ylang and warm vanilla. There’s also (scented or unscented) creamy Bawdy Butter, Hair & Bawdy Oil, lube & more. Bawdy Merchandise means you smell great while supporting a podcast that you love.

Get yours today at https://bawdystorytelling.com/merchandise

 

Uberlube: It’s ‘Lube Facts with Dixie’, courtesy of Uberlube! This week: the history of silicone lube. The invention was made even better by Uberlube, a luxurious, high-grade silicone lubricant made from clean, body-friendly ingredients; it’s just silicone with a little Vitamin E. Überlube offers long-lasting performance with no flavor or scent. Right now, they’re offering **Bawdy Storytelling** listeners a special offer – 10% off and free shipping when you use my code “Dixie” at UberLube.com. That’s 10% off and free shipping! Just use the promo code “Dixie” at https://www.uberlube.com/

 

Patreon: Wanna be connected to other Bawdy fans, and get great rewards? Our Patreon have brand new patron tiers like the #BPC, the Confidante, the Concierge & more. Our Hookup ($10/month) & up supporters receive free tickets to special events, Free tickets to our Livestream shows, access to the livestream replay, ad-free episodes of the podcast & more. Patreon has become our Everything during COVID; A global pandemic, quarantine and economic devastation all at the same time? While other entertainment is fading out, Patreon (and you) can help us continue to produce the the podcast & the livestreams until we can get back to live shows. We can ride this thing out, with your help; Become a Member Now at https://www.patreon.com/Bawdy

 

Not a fan of Patreon? You can support Bawdy by sending your one-time donation to:

Venmo: Venmo.com/BawdyStorytelling

Paypal: BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com

Zelle: BawdyStorytelling@gmail.com

(& Thank You in advance for keeping us going)

 

Ready to tell your story, and change your life? I’m offering Storytelling for Self-Discovery, and I’d love to help you find your story. Anxious about navigating what’s next? Are you writing a book, or working on your Business’ brand storytelling?  No matter what you’re up against, I can help you communicate with calmness & clarity. Book a Discovery call at calendly.com/dixiedelatour/

Or email me at dixie@BawdyStorytelling.com for more info.

 

Check out our Bawdy Storytelling Fiends and Fans group on Facebook - it’s a place to discuss the podcast’s stories with the storytellers, share thoughts with your fellow listeners, & help Dixie make the podcast even better. Just answer 3 simple questions and you’re IN! https://www.facebook.com/groups/360169851578316/
